It was another sunny day at Myaiu City High. The first class bell rang and the students were all busy rushing to their classes. Excitement was in the air, for it was Friday and in six hours everyone would be home enjoying the weekend. One student, however, seemed to be late!

They dashed along the sidewalk as fast as they could to beat the late bell. It was...

115.title: More Fat Furry Species

12.content:
If there was one thing Varieo wasn't, it was a runner. Though he was of medium build it was all mostly upper body. Sweat dripped down his gray T-shirt and navy blue cargo pants. He huffed and puffed through the alleyways of Myaiu City as fast as he could. If the track coach could see him now, he'd probably consider letting him join for once.

"I'm going to be late...I'm going to be late...I'm going to be late..." He chanted to himself, jumping over trash cans.

Then a big obstacle made an appear. A chain fence stood between Varieo and the street to his school. He could easily climb over it, but it was what had it's foot stuck in the fence that proved a greater challenge.

"A cat...a bloody cat..." He said to himself as an orange kitten desperately tried to claw it's way out of the chains.

Varieo hated cats. His aunt kept dozens of the fur balls around the house when he was a kid. They were nasty things and did everything to him; from spitting hairballs on him while asleep to knocking over a bucket of water onto his head. He HATED cats, which was odd considering what a kindhearted person he was. And it was this same stupid kindness that was forcing him to help free the entangled kitty.

"Alright now....Here kitty, kitty...I'm not going to hurt you...That's it...Now let me just grab your little paw here and...What the?! OW-OUCH! The stupid thing scratched me!"

The orange tabby cat took off in a flash, leaving Varieo to suck the blood oozing from his carved hand. Three giant claw marks had been cut into his hand, very deeply. He was in pain, but he was already late. Turning to the fence he muttered to himself.

"See if I help another mangy fur-wad again..."

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Varieo had already missed his first class, barging into his second period class earned him a glare from his teacher. He took his seat next to his friend Bloono, who as always was chewing on a stick of celery. Bloono didn't even bother to ask why he was late, which was good considering the mood Varieo was in. The cut had developed some sort of odd pus, making it looked infected.

"Just my luck." Varieo thought to himself. "That cat probably had rabies or something...I probably need to get a shot now."

He took his handkerchief out and wrapped the wound up. Allowing him to return his attention to class. The rest of the day went fairly normal, he chatted with his friends who showed some concern when they saw his bandaged hand. It was nice to know they cared enough to ask. He decided that he would go to the nurse after lunch to have her take a look at it.

However, when lunch did finally come around Varieo felt something odd...
12.title: Varieo Alick

choices: There's an explosion and someone (Cashlin) with thugs shows up!
He bumps into a couple of his friends, who look scared...
121.content:
Varieo was in the bathroom, trying to wash out the cut, when he felt a pain in his butt.

The boy turned around to see what was wrong with himself and saw a long tawny cat's tail, which had ripped through his pants.

"What?!?" he exclaimed, jumping in surprise. 'Okay, this has to be some kind of trick...'

Varieo tried moving the tail to test his theory and discovered that it moved in the direction that he had commanded it to. He even pulled on it, only to be rewarded by a sharp pain.

"Ow!" he yelled. Varieo glanced at the mirror and saw that his eyes were now more feral, and his ears seemed to be moving.

"Hang the Nurse! I need to get to a hospital!"

The young, mutating boy then ran off when...
121.title: Varieo's tail!

1212.content:
Varieo heads to the bathroom exit when he begins to feel a sudden pressure in his stomach.

As he bring his hands to his stomach, the pressure then turns into a comforting warmth all throughout his body.

Varieo's face turns into one of shock as his stomach starts to to bulge out at a somewhat rapid pace, pushing his shirt up past his naval, and revealing his now heavily hairy torso matchin the color of his newly accuired tail.

The boyn remained speachless as the rest of his body began to fill out. His butt swelled out about two inched as his legs thickened. His belly began to lose it's round shape andsagged down the waistline of his pants.His face had now become round, complete with full cheeks and a small double chin. Even his chest had puffed out about an inch.

Varieo stood there in his now ridiculously small wardrobe and debated on what to do. He reached for the handle of the bathroom door as someone was coming in.

it was...
1212.title: He begins to feel heavy

122.content:
As Varieo sat at a table to eat his food, he was getting some weird glances from his fellow friends.
"Um, guys, why do you keep looking at me that way?" he asked.
"Oh, no reason. Your hair just looks longer than before." One of them said.
"Uh, what do you mean by that?"
"Well, I could have sworn that your hair was shorter this morning, that much I can say."
"Come on guys, my hair doesn't grow that fast."
As they continued their meal, Varieo noticed some hair on the back of his hand, and it was spreading!
"What the!?" he shouted in surprise.
"What? What happened?" asked one of his friends in concern.
"Uh, I g-gotta go!" he said before running off.
As he ran out the cafeteria, he passed by Bloono, who dropped his celery stick, and Varie, who almost got knocked down by Varieo.I his panicked haste, he didn't even hear them calling his name.

         As he reached the bathroom, he made sure it was empty before closing the door and locking it. Varieo looked at the mirror and noticed his hair has gotten a bit longer...and spreading too. He looked at his arms and saw it was growing fur all over, except for the arm that had the bandaged hand. The whole arm was covered in fur. He took off the bandage and saw the cut marks are completely gone for some reason. Not only that, but his hands were growing claws too.
"What the hell kind of cat was that!? Now I'm mutating from it!"
It wasn't long before his ears moved to the top of his head and grew long and pointed. His face grew a long snout, a long furry tail burst out of his pants, and sharp claws ripped his shoes to pieces. He stood there in the empty bathroom, looking at the reflection of an anthropomorphic wolf in the mirror. He touched every detail of his new lupine body, not wanting to believe a single second of what happened.
"This isn't real, this isn't real at all! Cat scratches don't just mutate people into animals! This can't be happening!"

         After a few minutes of talking to himself, Varieo finally calmed down enough to think about what to do next...At least, until the next unexpected thing happened.
122.title: Do Wolves Hate Cats Too?

choices: Began to change more and more. He needed a hiding spot.
1221.content:
"Varieo you in there?" Bloono asked, he was worried for his friend's safety.

Varieo was already worried about his body changing, but he had nothing, with a clawed hand he made sure the door was locked.

"Uh, I'm fine I just had to use the bathroom. Can you do me a favor and tell the others I'll see them later?"

"I suppose I can." he said, "I'll see you later man."

"Yeah...Bye." Varieo said, his voice turning rougher. When he was sure his friend was gone and he heard the class bell ring her walked out. The hall seemed completely empty.

Walking out and doing his best to ignore his growing gut he went to the door.

'maybe I can sneak out without someone seeing me.' he thought. As he left though he...
1221.title: Someone was at the door

12211.content:
Varieo looked around him as he cautiously walked down the hall. Everyone was in the classrooms around him, and he can hear the chatter and talk of the other students inside. Now that he's a wolf, his senses were sharper than before. As he approached the end of the hall, he heard footsteps approaching him from somewhere. "Oh no, I can't let anyone see me like this! I've gotta find a place to hide!" Panicking, Varieo rounded the corner of the hallway, only to bump into someone head on. "Ow, what hit me?" Varie looked up to see an anthropomorphic wolf with a distended stomach poking out of the too small shirt it was wearing. When Varieo looked up, he saw his friend Varie staring at him. "Ah! D-don't scream! Please, don't scream! It's me Varieo!" "Varieo? What happened to you!? And...what have you been eating?" Varie stared at Varieo's growing gut, much to his dismay. "Ugh, stupid cat scratch!" "Cat scratch? You mean to tell me that a cat did all this to you?"

"Attention students, attention students," the P.A. system suddenly said all around the school. "I'm terribly sorry to say this, but I regret to inform you all that I have received word that one of our students have been infected with a newly discovered disease called 'Morphosis'. Everyone must stay in their rooms for I believe this disease is contagious and, most likely, very dangerous. To prevent further infection, the government will send a team of scientists to located the infected student and try to find a cure for him or her. Thank you." "This is just great. More good news." Varieo said, covering his face with a clawed hand. "Well, what do you think you're doing, sitting there like a lost cub like that? It's time to go!" Varie said, already standing when Varieo looked at her. "What do you mean by that Varie!? I can't go with you, let alone be near you! I can't just put you in danger like that!" "And I can't just let a bunch of guys in suits take you away for experiments and stuff! I'm not going to just abandon you! And besides, we've already head butted each other, so I might as well be infected already!" She's right. They've already touched each other, and that could already be enough to infected someone else. Being near her won't cause anymore damage than what's already been done.

Before Varieo can realize it, Varie has already gotten a running start down a random hallway. As Varieo ran after her, he was stunned to see how quickly he was gaining after her, without even breaking a sweat! Plus, he feels really light on his feet, even with the 3-inch gut in front of him. "Varie! I think there's something else that's happening to me!" "Huh? What was that?" Varie looked behind her and was surprised to see her wolf friend a lot closer than she thought he would be. She knew Varieo wasn't much of a runner, but to catch up with her so fast like that!? As the two turned to a different hallway, they were spotted by some men with hazmat suits and tranquilizer guns. "What kind of disease do these people think this is!? A zombie virus!?" Varieo said as the agents ran after them. "Quick, this way!" Varie led the two to the opposite hallway. The government agents were right on their tail, with Varie and Varieo turning every which way to try and lose them. Finally, the agents ran to a different direction. Varie started panting while holding her knees, but Varieo was wondering why he's not as tired as Varie is. "Aren't you, *pant* even a bit, *pant* out of breath? *pant*" "Strangely enough, no I'm not. There's definitely something fishy about this disease I have. I just hope that someone would explain this to me soon enough."

As if he got his wish, Varie and Varieo was shot by tranquilizer darts, and fell into the darkness of slumber.
12211.title: Varie!?

choices: Have Dr. Kane get the file
122111.content:
Varieo began stirring from his slumber. His eyes slowly open, adjusting to the light above him. As he shook off the rest of his drowsyness, he sat up on a metal table, seeing his shirt completely gone, and only a part of his pants still intact enough to cover up his modesty. What he didn't expect to see was how big his stomach has grown while he's asleep. In fact, his whole body plumped out. His arms and legs were a lot thicker, with or without fur. His neck was quite large now,with a second one growing uderneath it. His chest was puffy and seemed to be getting some a bit bigger too. But what really caught Varieo's eyes the most was his stomach. It was the size of an overinflated beachball now! More or less even bigger than that! Varieo placed his hand on it, feeling the soft fat under his fur. He pushed into it, his hand sinking into his gut. He shook his head, suddenly remembering that Varie was with him back in school. He looked around and saw that this definitely wasn't his school anymore. There was a table with a bunch of tools and chemistry equipment ahead of him, right across the room. There was a large window to his left, and a big door to his right, which must've been the way out. Just then, the door slid open and a scientist, accompanied with two guards with tranquilizer guns, entered the room. "Hey, who are you guys, and where am I?" Varieo asked the scientist. "I'm sorry, Mr. Alick for having to drag you all the way here from your school. I'm the chief virologist in this facility. My name is Dr. Kane." "Alright, but where's Varie? What did you do to her?" "Ah, the girl. Well, she's still asleep right now, and for some reason, it also appears that she's still human. Did you even touch her yet?" Dr. Kane asked, looking at Varieo's entire body. "Well, we accidentally bumped into each other, but I think that's about it." Varieo said, putting his hands on any part of his body that Dr. Kane is looking at. "Hmm, interesting. And how did you get infected?" Dr. Kane said, finally looking at Varieo in the face. "Well, um, I was running late for school today, and I cot scratched at by this cat. And, that's all I think there is." The scientist eyed him carefully, a bit skeptical at Varieo's recollection. "You were scratched by a cat?" "Yes." "Was it any normal cat? Nothing special about it at all?" "No, not at all." Dr. Kane backed off a bit to look at Varieo's entire body again, much to the latter's embarrassment. Finally, Dr. Kane turned and headed to the door. "I'll be back with results from tests we took while you were unconscious. Don't worry, it won't take long." The guards followed him out the door, leaving Varieo alone in the room again.

After a while, Dr. Kane returned, this time without the guards. "Well, Mr. Alick, I've got some good news for you." Varieo sat up on the table, eager to hear the results. "It seems that this disease can only enter through an open wound, not on just skin contact." Varieo gave a sigh of relief, believing that he didn't get his friend infected like him. "I've also got some bad news to tell you, also." Varieo immediately looked at Dr. Kane, worry beginning to fill him from head to toe. "It seems that the virus causing this disease can survive on the skin of an infected individual. And, it can survive on the skin of an uninfected individual for a limited time before dying, so your friend may have a chance of becoming infected after all." Varieo gave off a slight whimper, which kinda caught him off guard, since he wasn't even thinking of whimpering at all. Dr. Kane immediately gave a friendly smile, thinking of something to help comfort the obese wolf anthro. "Don't worry now, we just have to wait for the virus itself to die before your friend is homefree from becoming infected. We just have to make sure that she doesn't get any bruises or cuts of any kind, no matter how small." Varieo did perk up a bit from hearing this good news. "Um, Dr. Kane?" "Yes?" "Just, what IS this Morphosis or whatever this disease is even called supposed to be anyway? I turned into a fat wolf in my school, but I felt lighter, and I didn't even get tired from running away from those government guys. What's this virus supposed to even do in the first place?" Dr. Kane went quiet for a bit, which made Varieo even more curious than before. "The truth is, the government has an entire file all about this disease, and if you really want me to, I could get it for you." Varieo got even more curious about this. The disease is supposed to be newly discovered, but they have an entire file about it? What's could this Morphosis truly be?
122111.title: Lab Testing

1221111.content:
"Um, maybe you could get the file and read it to me...I'd like to know more about this." Varieo said, looking at the ground. "Well then, I guess I'll be going then." Dr. Kane immediately left, leaving Varieo alone in the room again. This time though, it took a long while before he came back. This time, he had a disappointed expression on his face. "Sorry Varieo, but only authorized personnel are allowed to enter the archives the files are being kept. I'm sorry, but there's nothing I can do." "But, I have to know what the file says! It's impossible to make a data file on something they just found! There must be something about this that they know!" "Yes Varieo, I know about that, and I'm just as suspicious as you are, but unless something happened, I won't be able to get to that file."

Suddenly, Dr. Kane's eyes widened as an idea came to his head. "Wait! I just got an idea!" "Well, what is it?" "What if an emergency happened here, which caught the attention of all the guards?" "That would be a good distraction. That way, you can get the file while the guards are all distracted! But where are we going to find a distraction good enough?" "Easy. Say, if a subject we were observing suddenly finds a way out of the observation room and starts causing mayhem in the facility, All the guards will have to come and try to stop it." Varieo can already see just where this conversation was going. He gave a sigh before getting off the metal table.

Two guards were having a conversation when Varieo suddenly burst through a door and roared at them. The two were caught off guard by this and ran away. "*sigh*I hope Dr. Kane get the file so I don't have to keep acting like a fat monster here." he said as he continued down a random hallway and roared again. Meanwhile, Dr. Kane ran up to the guards watching the door to the archives room. "Guards, guards! It's the subject! He's escaped and now he's going on a rampage!" Just then, the distant sound of Varieo roaring somewhere echoed throughout the hallway. The guards immediately ran toward the source of Varieo's howl. Dr. Kane watched them leave as he quietly opened the door and entered. From there, he booted the super computer inside and began searching for the file. Once found, he grabbed an empty hard drive he keeps in his pocket, downloaded the file and shut the power off to make it look like it was untampered with. He left the room and began his search for Varieo.

Varieo was running away from some guards chasing after him. After taking a few turns, he lost them. He still couldn't believe the speed he was going, even with all the excess weight on him. He began howling again. If there's one thing he knows about wolves, it's that wolves howl to alert pack members their location. So, it's only logical for Varieo to howl so Dr. Kane will find him, in theory that is. After a couple more howls, he can hear footsteps coming from behind him...
1221111.title: The Restricted Archives

choices: Got out of the lab unscathed
12211111.content:
Dr. Kane runs up to Varieo, who turns to his direction. "Dr. Kane! Did you get the file?" "Yes, I did Varieo. We'd better get out of here as fast as we can, the guards will be here any minute." "But what about Varie!? We've gotta find her and save her too!" Dr. Kane nods in agreement as the scientist leads the obese wolf down a few corridors...

Meanwhile, in where Varie was sleeping, she wakes up on a metal table, taking in the surroundings. She's still fully human. "Ugh...Where am I? What is this place?" She hears the yelling of guards beyond the door leading to the hallway. "Huh? I wonder who's making all that racket?" She gets off the table and peers out the door. A large number of guards were running down the hallway, yelling about an escaped subject. "I wonder who they're talking about." She decided to stop one of the guards to ask. "Excuse me." "What is it little girl!? I'm in a hurry here!" "Well, I'm just kinda wondering what all the fuss is all about." "Ugh, listen. There's an escaped subject on the loose, and its going crazy here in the lab. Now I gotta go, you've wasted enough of my time!" The guard ran down the hall, with Varie running after him to get more information.

Varieo and Dr. Kane was running down a corridor, hoping to reach the observation room Varie was kept in. As they were about to make a turn, they saw a guard holding Varie with her arms behind her back. "Alright, I know that you're friends with that monstrous freak! Tell me where he is!" "Ah! I told you, I don't know where Varieo is right now!" The sight of it all made Varieo feel an intense anger building up inside of him. "Get away from her!!!" Varieo ran at the guard and punched him square in the face. He was sent tumbling down the hall until he landed on the wall and fell unconscious. "Varieo!" Varie hugged her savior tightly, but only reached half way around his belly. She stayed there for a few minutes before Varieo finally broke the awkward silence. "Um...Varie...We, uh...We really need to get out of this place." Varie instantly let go. "Oh, uh, right, hehe..." Dr. Kane stepped in and told them about the guards most likely blocking off some of the hallways. "Um, who are you?" "Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't introduce myself. My name is Dr. Kane, young miss. What is yours?" "I'm Avariella. Varie for short. What the heck is this place anyway." "No time to explain. First, he must escape the facility before more guards arrive."
12211111.title: The Escape

choices: They make it back in time for experimenting.
122111111.content:
The three were running down a hallway, the sound of guards trailing them behind. Dr. Kane led the party, with Varie in the middle and Varieo trailing behind. When they reached the next intersection, they were met with guards on one side.

"Look! There they are!" "Oh crud."

The guards began firing at them as the party ran down the other direction. "This is bad! That corridor leads to the exit of the facility! We'll have to go around them." Dr. Kane said.

As they continued to run, they met a few guards in their way. Varieo easily jumped over his friends and pounced on them, knocking them out. Eventally, they reach a wide corridor with an open double-doorway at the end, sunlight shining in through the opening to the woods.

"There it is!"

Suddenly, two turret guns came out of panels from the walls and began firing bullets at them. "Oh come on! Why would they even have that!?" Varie complained.

Varieo immediately rushed at the turrets, dodging the gunfire and ripping them out of the walls with his bare claws. He stared at his hands in amazement.

"Seriously, how strong have I become?" "Not now, Varieo! We need to leave!" Dr. Kane called out to him.

Varieo looked up and saw the two already running ahead of him. He began running behind them, not noticing a guard running towards the hallway, reaching the exit. "This one's for you, freak!" The guard aimed a pistol at Varieo and pulled the trigger. Varieo heard the gunfire and instinctively side-stepped, narrowly missing the lead projectile aimed at him. But then, the bullet continued on ahead of him, and reached Varie. She screamed, falling to the ground. "Varie!" Varieo picked her up and continued running with Dr. Kane ahead of him.

When the three were well away from the lab, they got down and rested. Varieo carefuly laid Varie on the ground. "Varie, are you okay?" "Yeah, I think that last shot just grazed me, that's all." Varie raised her arm, showing a small cut made by the bullet. Dr. Kane and Varieo looked at each other, faces full of distress and worry. "Guys, what's wrong? It's just a scratch." "Well, you see miss, the virus that changed your friend here is called Morphosis." Dr. Kane said. "Yeah, I already know that. The principal said it over the speakers back in school." "You see, that thing is...Well, since you've been so close to Varieo here, that means you've got the virus too." "Huh? Then why am I still human?" "Well, um...The thing is, just having the virus isn't really enough to change you. It can't get into you unless you get hurt. Like, well, you know." Varie looked at the cut on her arm for a few seconds before realizing what it means. "You mean I'm gonna turn into a fat wolf like Varieo!?" "N-no no! I believe the animal you turn into depends on your DNA. But a morbidly obese one, yes..." Varie almost flipped, saying all kinds of things, like how she can't go to school looking like a fat animal, or how she might lose her title as the most athletic student in school, and various other complaints. Varieo just sat down and kept thinking about the cat that morning. "Stupid cat. The one time I try to do something nice to those demons, this happens..."

Once everyone has calmed down a bit, Dr. Kane suggested going to his house, which also doubled as his own personal lab. "It's not too far from this area, and I've got the data on Morphosis those goverment people had in their computers. I can begin studying it and maybe even find a cure for the two of you as well." "That's great! C'mon then guys, time's a waistin'! Let's go!" Varie began running to a random direction. Dr. Kane called out. "Other way, Varie!" Varie began running back to them. "I knew that. And maybe I should just let you go first. It's your house, after all." As they continued walking down the forest, Varieo felt somewhat uncomfortable with Dr. Kane's sudden change in sides. "Hey Dr. Kane, what made you want to help us bust out of there instead? I mean, don't you work for those government scientists?" "Yes, until the apparent discovery of the disease in your school. I overheard one of them say that they made sure to cover up an incident regarding the Morphosis disease. Apparently, I don't like the way the government already knew about this virus, and I just want to find out what they know about it. If they made this disease in the first place..." Dr. Kane stopped mid-sentence, not wanting to talk any further. Varieo decided to stay quiet for the rest of the trip.
122111111.title: Well, Almost Unscathed

choices: check his reflection in the lake like a mirror
get in trouble for ditching school
123.content:
he sat down with his food and found himself feeling very hungry. he started to eat but with each bite he became more desperate for the food. he started to chew and swallow much more frantically, not noticing his stomach start to swell. he stood up to get more food and he came back with a lot of meat and started to eat that. his friends started to notice and asked him if he was okay. Varieo felt embarrassed and slowed down, however his gorging caused his stomach to become noticeably larger and likewise his stomach capacity. Varieo had another change that was important, his teeth had all sharpened, especially his canines, and a hunger for more meat was present.

after finishing his second plate it was the end of lunch and his shirt was tight around his stomach, and embarrassingly, his chest. this did not go unnoticed by Varieo or his friends. one of his friends, Ridge commented by saying that he had to watch what he was eating, which made Varieo feel a bit calmer but still anxious about his waist, but calm enough to smile and reveal to Ridge his new set of teeth. it was now when Varieo noticed his teeth and, Ridge gasped but said nothing. in response Varieo claimed he was going to see the nurse, and so he and his friends parted ways, but Varieo had other plans.

instead of the nurse Varieo went against his moral fibre and left the school to go find places where he could eat. He found a convenience store and use his pocket money to buy enough chocolate, sweets, meat flavoured chips to feed his friends and then some and an icecream. he started with the ice cream before it could melt and ate it on his way to the park with each lick adding to his weight. the park was empty by now and there was a lake where people would some times swim.
as he finished his ice cream he felt his pants burst. he inspected his bodyhis stomach was now starting to hang down and fold on to his body, he also now had moobs that were well defined in his now much too small shirt. his arms and legs were softer too making it very uncomfortable to move in his clothes and his butt, which had burst his pants, was much rounder too. and a good thing too for varieo felt his spine was growing turning into something. Varieo deceided to then...
123.title: He was getting fatter!

choices: The strange goth showed up again.
14.content:
Renny was running as fast as she could, wishing that she remembered her skateboard that morning.

She had already missed her first three periods and was about to be late for lunch! Having already been retained once, the tomboy couldn't afford any more absences.

"C'mon Renny! Only one block left and your totally there!" she thought, ignoring the indecent men staring at her large chest.

The girl was wearing a white shirt beneath a jean jacket, as well as baggy pants and sneakers, although she forgot an important article of clothing. "I knew I should have worn that bra, no matter how late I was!"

Within minutes, the girl was mere feet away from the school when she bumped into a tall, somewhat overweight woman with long dark hair.

Her clothes looked gothic, and she wore heavy eyeshadow, but still had an arrogant and spoiled air about her.

"Sorry Sis, my bad!" Renny said, still dashing away.

"Hmph, be glad that I'm in a good mood 'Sis'..." The mysterious woman said cryptically before walking away.

=====

Soon Renny was at the cafeteria and found her best friend, Aerore, alongside others.

"Afternoon Renny, I see you made it." Aerore said as her elder friend sat down.

"Wouldn't miss it for the world Aerore!" she said, ruffling her hair. she then saw some of her other friends: Aleck, Varie, and Bloono "Yo guys!"

They all said hello back and the group began chatting.

"So how are you Renny?" Bloono asked as he munched a celery stick, looking at his senior.

"Fine, but I have this weird headache."

"You sick?" Aleck asked, Renny shook her head no.

"Well you should drink orange juice, that always helps me when I'm down." Varie commented.

"I concur. Orange juice is a healthy beverage." Aerore said.

"Alright alright, I'll drink plenty."The 19 year old said as she headed towards the lunch line.

Just then...
14.title: Renny Kaida

142.content:
As Renny entered the lunch line, she grunted and then felt her shoulder. It felt heavier. She then tapped on her skin because it felt somewhat harder and thicker. "What the?" she asked. It was at that moment, a mosquito flew in from the window and landed on Renny's shoulder. It tried to bite through her skin and suck her blood but for some reason, Renny's skin was too thick for the mosquito to pierce her skin. "That's odd," said Renny right before she heard a popping sound." She looked down to see that the button on her pants had popped off. "Huh?" she asked. "I must be sicker than I thought.

After Renny got a couple of burgers and fries from the lunch line, she placed them down on a nearby table and then she walked over to a vending machine and bend over to buy an orange juice from the machine. "That's odd?" thought Renny. "Today, this vending machine looks smaller." As Renny was bought her orange juice, she heard a ripping noise and then looked to the side of her pants to see several of the seams had burst. "O...kay," said the 19 year old. "Perhaps I should just skip the burger and fries." As Renny drank the orange juice, she grunted as she felt her face. "Oooh," she groaned. "Oh!" At that moment, Aerore came up to her. "Renny?" she asked in concern. "Are you alright."

Renny grunted as she looked down and saw that her face seemed to be turning into some sort of snout. "My face," grunted Renny. "My face feels like it's stretching out. Aerore then noticed that Renny seemed to be putting on weight at a rapid speed. "What have you been eating, Renny?" she asks. "You're starting to look like a beached whale. Now that I think about it, you look like you're getting taller as well. "Huh?" asked Renny as she stood up. "What are... ow!" Renny had hit her head on the ceiling and made the ceiling crack. She then gave a gasp and then looked at her hands to see they were getting pudgier and that her skin looked even thicker than before, like that of some hard-skinned animal.

Then Renny hears more ripping as her clothes begin to come apart. She is continuing to grow into a fat giantess and screams, alerting everyone in the cafeteria who looks in shock. Some of them even take photographs as Renny's skin turned thicker. She was changing into a giant anthropomorphic and obese...
142.title: Thick-Skinned Giant

145.content:
As Renny stood in line, she noticed that her feet were hurting. It felt like they were cramped or something, which was very odd. Renny had stopped growing since middle school and had the same pair of shoes for 2 years. Maybe she grabbed her sister's by mistake. Nope these were size 7, her size. What could be the problem?

"You okay Renny?" Asked Aerore. "You look positively perturbed."

"I-I'm fine. My shoes feel tight..."

"Well why not walk around barefoot? I do it all the time. It's very liberating. Plus I think-" Continued Varie.

"Next!" Interrupted the lunch lady.

Renny got the usual chicken nuggets and fries, making sure to grab two bottles of orange juice. Her aching head was making her a bit dizzy, she quickly sat down at the table and began eating. The food tasted odd for some reason today. Normally the nuggets were juicy and tender, today it was like eating crap. She spit them out on the table. Varieo, who had just sat down to eat, noticed his friend's sudden dislike of the food.

"What's the matter? You love chicken nuggets."

"I don't know. They just taste...bad for some reason."

He reached and grabbed one off her plate, taking a small bite. "They're perfectly fine to me."

"I think I'm sicker than I thought..." She grabbed her head.

There was a moment of silence followed by a loud "RIIIIIIIIIIIIIP!" Renny felt a slight breeze in her shoes and looked down. Somehow, her toes had literally ripped through her sneakers! Verieo looked at her with increasing concern.

"Did you just rip your pants or something? Are you alright Renny?"

Renny began to panic and stood up. "I-I'm fine, I-I just g-gotta...go to the bathroom. Y-yea. Save my seat."

She hurried out of sight and into the girls room. Thankfully, no one was in the bathroom leaving her free to tear the remainder of her shoes off. Even her socks had somehow been ripped through. Her feet were looking enormous! She was breathing heavily now, leaning over the sunk. An unbearable heat filled her, like she was in a sauna. Little did she know, a small little nub appeared on her lower spine.

"What's happening to me...?"
145.title: Big feet?

choices: She hears a schoolwide emergency announcement.
1451.content:
Renny decided to sit down in one of the empty stalls and rest for a bit.

"Well it looks like they stopped growing, but man these things are big..." she thought looking at her feet, when she noticed that she was even hotter than before.

"What's with me today?" the brown haied girl asked, when she looked and saw light gold colored fur was growing rapidly now all over her body.

Soon she was entirely covered in it, and that nub felt like it was getting bigger. Also, her stomach looked bigger than before.

"I think I should see the nurse, like yesterday!" Renny said as she ran out, her new feet making her go faster.

On the way...
1451.title: Renny's day gets weirder.

choices: Men in radioactive suits see her.
14512.content:
The nub had become a large tail and could nearly touch the ground at this point. Renny could see that her nose was slowly growing outwards too! Oddly enough though, no one was in the hallway despite lunch being over. However Renny didn't seem to notice, being too interested in her new snout.

"I hope the nurse knows what's wrong with me...This fur will get annoying."

Suddenly there was an announcement from the loud speakers. "Attention all students! We have just been informed that there is a dangerous disease that has infected one of our students! The school will be on lock down while we examine each and everyone of you! Do not move from the room you are in!"

"Uh oh," Said Renny. "A dangerous disease? I gotta get to the nurse..."

Unknown to Renny, there were more changes going on. Every part of her body was getting bigger and fatter, causing her clothes to groan and snap. If she would have looked down at her ever growing stomach she would have noticed a large pouch developing. Her tail was dragging along behind her.

"Phew! I feel...heavier.."

All of a sudden...
14512.title: Emergency situation.

choices: Told her that she was infected with Morphosis
145121.content:
The next thing Renny knew, she was knocked out and on the ground for no apparent reason.

She then awoke to find herself on a examining table in a strange scientific facility.

Thre were test tubes and vials on a counter near a sink, and on the opposite side of the room was a computer.

And near a door there was a mirror.

Renny looked in the mirror to see herself...only different.

She was still fur covered, and now she had a pouch, that a normal sized person could easily fit into. Not only that but she was much larger, and was fat and jiggly. The only articles of clothing she had left were her panties and some vestiges of her shirt that mercifully covered her large breasts.

"Wow, I look like a Kangaroo girl, but why am I so..fat?" she asked, touching her stomach.

Just then a few scientist came in and...
145121.title: Waking up to a nightmare.

1451211.content:
Each of them had suits on that covered all of their features, a lot like the government guys in the ET movie. They cautiously approached her, several of them seemed to have needles in their hand. The man in the front spoke first.

"How do you feel young lady?"

Renny stood up. She easily towered over the man by a good few feet. "Warm and...strong." She flexed. "What happened to me? And who are you guys?"

"We are scientists for Myaiu Research, Ms. Kaida. You caught an extremely dangerous and contagious disease known as Morphosis. It enters your body on contact with your skin, and stimulates calories. These calories then creates a massive amount of surplus fat which overall makes your body grow to these proportions. There are also animal chromosomes in the sickness causing it to..."

Renny was completely lost though, and it showed to the scientist who tried to make it simple for her. "Um...Basically it's a disease that turned you into a giant fat animal."

"Oh...Well, how odd. I'd like to be turned back to normal then."

"That's the problem Ms. Kaida. There presently is no cure."

"WHAT!? I can't stay like this!"

"Of course not. That's why we're keeping you here and working around the clock to find a solution! Why, in just a few years, with your help, we can-"

"A FEW YEARS!? But I have a life to get back to! I can't stay here for a few years!" She began to glare angrily down at the scientist.

"Now miss, don't get violent. This is a secure facility. And the men behind me are trained to inject tranquilizer into yo-"

The man didn't get to finish. By a rare stroke of quick thinking, Renny had spun around on her massive feet and clobbered the group of men with her giant tail. All five of them went crashing into the wall leaving Kenny completely shocked at her new found strength.

"Oh my! I didn't think I hit them that hard! Are you okay mister?"

The men were completely knocked out; birds were spinning around their heads. Normally, she would have gone over to see if they were alright but she recalled what the man had said about the disease spreading on contact. It would be best to leave them alone. Thankfully, they had left the door behind them open allowing Renny to escape into the hall. It was like a white medical hospital but by luck it was completely void of people. This would allows Renny time to adjust to her new form a bit. Walking was a difficult task with gigantic feet.

"I know! I'll hop! Kangaroo's are good hoppers!"

The entire hallway shook under the weight of her body, but she was able to go much faster. She just hoped that no one would peak their heads out to see what all the noise was. What appeared to be an entrance was dead ahead, Renny hopped faster in order to reach it. Just then, the doors slowly opened. There stood...
1451211.title: The news and the escape.

choices: Aerore found alot of useful data.
The computer's system had been wiped in mid search!
14512111.content:
Renny saw that the person at the door was none other than her close friend, Aerore. Renny managed to stop herself before she made contact.

The white haired girl stood in awe and looked at the overweight kangaroo in front of her. So much about it was familiar to her. "Renny? Is it possible that that is you?"

"Who else would it be kiddo?" she said, her voice was confirmation enough. Suddenly Aerore hugged Renny fiercely, rubbing her head against her friend soft pouch.

"Oh Renny, you look so adorable! Whatever could those scientists done to you to make you so absolutely cute!"

"It wasn't them, I came in contact with some infected something or other...AND YOU JUST CAME IN CONTACT WITH ME!!!"

"Why would that ever be a bad thing?" the bookish girl asked.

"Because now your going to turn into a fat animal like me!!"

"Oh dear, that sound interesting, but problematic."

"You're telling me! And now anyone you touch will get sick too." Renny said.

She then began to rack her brain for anything that could help, when she remembered the computer.

"Well Aerore, could you go into that room with and download some things from a computer? Maybe it has something important in it!"

"I most certainly can! I'm positively exceptional with computers!" The glasses wearing girl said as she climbed into her friend's pouch, uninvited. "Let's proceed!

Renny sighed and hopped back to the room. On the Computer..
14512111.title: Renny bumps into Aerore

145121111.content:
Aerore immediately got to work on the computers, Renny had no idea how she could possibly type that fast. Computers always gave her a headache.

"Are you sure those guys are okay?" Asked Aerore, pointing to the groaning scientists Renny had knocked out.

"No idea...Just keep searching for stuff. They said the disease was called Morpho-something."

"Hmm, Morpho...Morphophila...Hey! I discovered something! Morphosis! Wow look at all this information..."

"Just put it on a flash drive or something. We need to get out of here."

"Okay Renny! Just give me a few moments to download it. It should be ready in about 62.34 seconds." She snatched her trusty flash drive she kept around her neck and plugged it into the machine.

Renny was on edge. She could have sworn she heard approaching footsteps coming down the hall. No doubt people would notice the group of scientists were missing. She tapped her big feet on the ground impatiently. A window on the computer popped up "File Download Complete."

"All preparations are complete Ren-" Said Aerore.

"HOLD IT RIGHT THERE!" A man in a suit similar to the scientists aimed a gun at the pair. "You girl! You're under arrest! And you, kangaroo! Don't move-"

Renny's body seemed to move on it's own. Before she could even think, her huge kangaroo foot was placed firmly in the face of the armed man. He was sent flying backwards, crashing in the hallway's wall. More footsteps were heard by Renny, armed guards were coming to detain them.

"Aerore! Hop in! We need to get out of here!"

She quickly concurred, grabbed the drive and jumped into Renny's pouch. When she was firmly in place, Renny sky rocketed out of the room into a hall filled with gun wielding soldiers. All of whom began to fire at the kangaroo girl. Renny reacted naturally again, ripping off a metal plate from the wall and using it as a shield. Aerore suggested something.

"Renny, use ricochet!"

"What the heck is ricko-shay??!"

"Just jump and bounce off the walls!"

Renny grunted and crouched real low, building up the power to bounce. Aiming at the wall, she unleashed the power in her legs and began to bounce around the hall like a pinball. From the speed and weight, the entire hallway cracked. The guards were unable to aim and fire at the high speed mass of fur, Renny was able to hit most of them while bouncing. She landed with a jolt and continued hopping for the exit, bullets flew past her head.

"Aerore! Get down!" She was about to burst through the glass door. When she was sure Aerore had ducked within the pouch, she kicked down the door. The glass harmlessly bounced off of her, keeping Aerore safe from harm.

They were in what appeared to big a large lobby. Several people working there cowered in fear at the sight of the giant kangaroo who had blasted through the door. Aerore peaked her head out of the pouch.

"Which way did you come in?" Asked Renny.

"I entered this facility through that entrance." She pointed at the main doorway which lead into a parking lot. They were apparently in a hospital out in the middle of the forest.

"Okay!" The sounds of sirens in the distance meant it was time to go. "Hang on! We're heading home."

------------------------------------------------------------------

Several hours later in a dark office, a bald man finished showing a young dark haired businessman the video of Renny breaking out of the research center.

"T-that's all the footage we have sir...We have no idea where they went." Said the bald man.

The businessman stroked his chin. "Did the researchers manage to persevere any belongings of the two?"

"Y-yes. Some tattered clothing belonging to the kangaroo girl. Why?"

He smiled. "Good. After seeing what a mere high schooler can do with the power of Morphosis, I can't wait to see what effect it has on a trained soldier. We'll combat Cashlin with our own army of super humans."

"Sir! You can't be serious! If the government finds out..."

"Then they won't find out, will they? Tell them we were able to terminate the infected girl, I doubt they'll cause us any trouble. After that, find some suitable volunteers. And Floydman, if you fail me then I'll make sure you're the first to receive the disease. Got it?"

"Y-yes sir..."
145121111.title: Search and run.

choices: Aerore, who was changing into a wolf
Her other friends who were worried.
1451211111.content:
It was 7:00pm and the sun had finally fallen. Renny was sitting on her bed and was watching the world outside her window. Her parents owned a relatively big three story house on the outskirts of town. Her room overlooked an empty, grassy plain. It wasn't the 19 year old mutant's ideal home, but it was still nice nonetheless.

When Renny and Aerore arrived they entered the house through a backdoor that her parents always left open.

She had forgotten her key on many occasions, even when her parents were gone on business trips (as they were now) and had stressed how important that it was that she remember her key. The result was weeks of her spending her nights with her four friends, which her parents disapproved of, causing them to always leave an entrance as a precaution.

One of Renny's favorite things to do was stargaze while listening to music on her MP3 player, but looking at the far off white lights in the sable sky while humming along to pop songs hadn't helped her mood very much.

'Well, this isn't the best way to start off summer, but at least I'm free.' she thought, trying to cheer herself up. Renny sighed and closed her window, and afterwards she cut off her music device.

She was starting to get bored and decided to watch television. The program that was on was a skateboarding competition.

"Awesome! Just what I needed!" Renny exclaimed as she sat on her bed, which groaned due to her extra weight. This was another thing to add to her list of 'Reasons-why-this-is the-suckiest-summer-ever': Turning into a furry blimp.

"Ah well, at least this show's good." Renny watched the TV attentively, when the skater on the screen preformed some pretty sweet moves.

Just then the girl's stomach began to rumble, she hadn't eaten all day. Aerore had gone out to grab some food and new clothes an hour ago, so she'd be back soon.

'I hope she hasn't changed yet...' Renny thought. Just then there was a knock. Renny opened and saw...
1451211111.title: Reunions are infectious.

14512111111.content:
It took every ounce of self-control Renny had to not burst out in laughter. Aerore had put on quite a lot of weight, her belly popped out from under her shirt and her limbs looked plumped. She hadn't sprouted any hair yet but her nose was black and bulbous, sticking out a good foot from her face with her mouth. Her ears had moved to the top of her head and had become pointed. Sharp teeth could be seen in her new snout, her fingernails had turned into claws.

"Well..." Said Renny stifling her giggling. "You're a sight for sore eyes. I hope no one saw you like that."

"Have no fear! The changes didn't commence until I was returning home." She handed Renny the new clothing, which still looked tight but was much better than sitting around in shards of clothing.

"You didn't touch anyone did you? The last thing we need is hundreds of poor people with this disease."

"Of course not! What kind of careless neanderthal do you take me for?!"

"Okay, okay. Sorry." She finished pulling up her new sweatpants. They looked like they were concealing a watermelon, which was Renny's massive gut. To make room for her tail, she had ripped a hole in the back. The shirt was a very large T-Shirt, which gave Renny little room to breathe in because of her huge bosom. She also had to rip a hole down the front, exposing plenty of cleavage but allowing her to breath at least. Renny sat down to eat, she was starving. Aerore, however, didn't touch her food. Renny noticed that she was sweating, fur had begun to sprout all over her body.

"Maybe you should get some rest. I blacked out when I began changing at school." Said the kangaroo girl.

"A-alright..." She climbed into Renny's bed. "Ren? What are we going to tell our friends? We can't stay like this forever..."

The older girl tried to cheer her up. "Don't worry kiddo. With that information you found at the lab, I'm sure there's something in there about returning to normal. We'll take a look at it when you wake up."

"O-okay...night Renny..."

"Good night."

Renny left Aerore alone and went downstairs to eat her dinner. The house seemed big and lonely again, as usual. She'd probably have to sleep on the couch but she didn't mind. She thanked god for air conditioning, all this fur was not the best thing to have at the start of summer. Sitting down, she turned on the skater show again. Suddenly the door bell rang...
14512111111.title: What big teeth you have...

choices: Aerore came down, fully changed and with vital info
145121111112.content:
Renny hopped downstair cautiously, trying not to make the whole house shake as she made her way down.

When she had gotten to the door she looked through the peephole and saw Avariella. standing outside looking worried.

At first Renny was reluctant to open the door. What would her hyper friends reaction be if she saw what happened to her? Would she over react and call the police?

"Renny! You there?! It's me Varie." the short athlete yelled. "If your home then open up! The boys and I are worried about you and Aerore.

Renny decided to let her friend enter. As the busty 19 year old knew, whenever Varie began to panic, she always made a scene.

She'd go from person to person until she knew where Renny was, which might cause more people to investigate.

The best thing to do was to let Varie in.

"Varie, I'm here with Aerore but before I open the door you have to promise not to touch me or her, or freak out!" Renny yelled through the door.

"Okay, but why?" the confused 17 year old asked.

"You'll see."

Renny then used her chubby, furred hand to open the door and let Varie in.

Instantly Varie began to open her mouth but Renny shushed her.

"Don't say anything, remember?"

"Oh right sorry, but why do you look like that? Is-"

"I'll explain once you come in."

Renny and Avariella then went into the kitchen where she explained everthing.

When she finished...
145121111112.title: Avariella's visit.

choices: A giant scaled monster bursted through the door.
1451211111121.content:
It took almost a full hour to get Varie to sit still and stop laughing at Renny. It then took another hour to tell her why she was now a giant kangaroo. It didn't help that she was completely hopped up on candy at this point and couldn't even sit down straight.

"Heheheh. That's so weird! So you're a kangaroo now? That's awesome! I bet you can make track with ease now! So what did Aerore turn into? A bookworm?"

"Actually, a Canis lupus." Said Aerore from the stairs. Her transformation was complete, there stood a gigantic (though still shorter than Renny) wolf with glasses. She had clutched in her chubby hands a few pieces of paper.

"A what?" Said Renny and Avariella blankly.

Aerore sighed. "A wolf. I'm a wolf. Or did you two go blind?"

"Sorry." Said Renny as she rubbed her head. "I hate it when you talk scientifically. I can never understand what you're saying. Anyway, what did you find out?"

"You're not going to believe this...But 'Morphosis', the disease we have, was actually a drug created by the government. The project was started to create super humans by multiplying the calories in your body by a vast amount, thus increasing your strength tremendously. They added animal DNA in the mix to further promote the growth but that caused a chain reaction and morphed the drug into an actual transmuted disease."

"I see...," Muttered Renny. "...Can you say that in English?"

Aerore tried her best to simplify it. "Umm...basically. It started as a drug that created fat and made you use it for more energy and strength. Then they added animal genes to it, now it's a disease that does this."

"Oh, that explains why I was able to take out all those guys with guns when escaping that research place...That reminds Aerore. What the heck were you doing there anyway? How did you know where to find me?"

"Who me? Well...My father works as a scientist for the government, right? He told me that he was treating you for the disease when I got home from school today. So I decided to visit you. I guess I got dragged into this mess huh?"

"Wait a moment." Said Avariella. "If it's contagious, aren't I in danger being around you two? The last thing I need is to end up big and fat before summer sports."

"You should be safe so long as you don't touch Renny or me. The disease only spreads on direct skin to skin contact."

Renny suddenly remembered that woman she had ran into just before school. "Aerore. Did the research say anything about returning to normal? I think the person I got it from looked just like a normal person, not an animal. There's gotta be some way to get back to normal."

"There is...but according to the notes only one test subject was able to successfully revert to human form again. She was named Cashlin."

"Well then, we just need to go find this Cashlin person, right?"

"I wish it were that simple. But the government terminated the entire project and eliminated all test subjects for good measure. Nothing was ever heard from the research again after that."

But that didn't stop Renny. "Then we'll just have to find out how to get back to normal ourselves then, right Aerore? With your brains, we should be able to figure it out."

Aerore laughed nervously. "Well, I admire your enthusiasm at least..."

"You guys are still forgetting the biggest problem." Said Avariella. "How in the world are you going to get around like that? I mean you can pull hiding away off for a few days but sooner or later your parents are going to find out. And what about Varieo and Bloono? You going to tell them too?"

Before either of them could think...
1451211111121.title: The wolf and the roo.

14512111111211.content:
Suddenly there was a loud boom as a gigantic scaled monster burst through the door, setting of Renny's family alarm system.

Renny face palmed "Great, now we have to leave before the cops get here!"

"The police are the least of your worries!" the giant reptile said. Upon closer inspection the creature had a large shell, signifying that it was a turtle, as well as a long tail and near razor sharp claws.

"Explain why you're here!" Aerore commanded, but she still seemed fearful.

"I am here to take you two to a safe place." He said before he noticed Avariella.

"So you expect for them to trust you after you burst in and make demands like that? And seriously you didn't even introduce yourself, and you set off an alarm. If I were Renny and Aerore I wouldn't trust you at all!"

"You're a talkative 'Normal' aren't you?" The turtle-man asked rhetorically. He then marched towards her, brandishing his claws. "Maybe if infect you you'll be less chatty, of course my claws aren't know for being...dull."

Varie looked scared as the stranger lumbered towards her menacingly.

When he got really close though Renny delivered a strong kick to his chest.

The scaly foe was actually sent back a couple feet, and fell on his back, rendering him immobile.

"Why did you attack? I was just-"

"Trying to infect my friend!" Renny said angrily. "I don't know who you are, but if you ever threaten them again..." she started when...
14512111111211.title: The first real fight!

choices: One of their friends! (What are the odds?)
145121111112112.content:
Police cars were pulling into Renny's driveway. Officers began to rush at the hole in her house with guns drawn.

"Perfect! Now we gotta get out of here! Quick Varie, hop in my pouch-"

"Renny!"

"Oh right, does that mean we have to run normally? Crap! Let's use the backdoor!"

All three on them left the giant turtle stuck on his back. He rolled around aimlessly trying to get onto his feet again..

"Um, excuse me." Said the reptile man. "Can one of you ladies give me a hand here? Help? Please?"

"Police! Freeze!" About a dozen policemen aimed their weapons at the giant turtle.

"Christ. I hate the police. Can you guys just give me a second so I can get up-"

They all fired at him, but the turtle quickly dove into his shell. Most of the bullets merely bounced off the rock hard material. The shell then began to spin in circles at an alarming speed. With a jolt, the turtle was able to launch himself through the crowd of police knocking every single one of them out.

"You should count yourselves unfortunate. My shell doesn't pass the gift. Oh, well can't be helped. I gotta catch up to those brats or Cashlin will kill me."

--------------------------------------------------------

"I don't hear anything anymore! I think we lost them!" Shouted Aerore.

Renny had taken the lead, being the fastest in the group. Aerore was not far behind her. Varie, on the other hand, was struggling just to stay in range of them despite being athletic. She yelled at them through a mixture of huffs and puffs.

"H-how c-can you guys...Be...Soooo fat and so fast at the s-same time!?"

"Quit your complaining! You've always been the fastest but now we're part animal! Just take your losses like a-"

SLAM! Renny ran straight into someone...It was...
145121111112112.title: Cops and runners.

choices: They headed to an abandoned building, and Varieo has amnesia
they come across an abandonded car and the others change
1451211111121121.content:
Renny had managed to hop right into Varieo, another one of their freinds.

The younger boy had been wandering around, something he often did when he was trying to forget something, when he felt his body come in contact with something soft, warm and and a little squishy.

Renny realized that she had run right into Varieo and had stopped. His head had managed to touch her cleavage accidentaly, but she was more worried about whether or not he was conscious. As luck would have it he wasn't.

"Great, now we just need to find Bloono and the whole group will be here." Renny said sarcastically. She paused long enough to see that Aerore and Avariella were pretty close, while the turtle an was still far behind, but traveling quickly.

"Oh my, could that possibly be Varieo?" Aerore asked while Avariella breathed in and out.

"Yep, and lucky us, he managed to touch my skin and get knocked out." Renny said, putting the unconscious boy in her pouch.

"Where..*huff*...at...*Puff*?" The athlete asked.

Renny blushed, not wanting to embarrass herself by telling the truth. "M-my arm...But we need to get away fast. Varie, you need to get in here with Varieo."

"But Renny, what about Morphosis?" Aerore asked.

"We can't escape whatisname if Varie can't run, and more than likely she'll end up sick anyway. At this point, living is what's most important."

Aerore nodded, but Varie still seemed reluctant.

"But what about summer sports and-"

"Just get in!" Renny yelled. The short athelete could see how dire the situation was and got in.

It was a tight squeeze, and made Renny uncomfortable, but they managed to compensate by outrunning the turtle man.

After they were long gone...
1451211111121121.title: A run in with Varieo

choices: Go ask Aerore's parents for help.
14512111111211211.content:
"Alright guys. Where are we hiding? We know we can't go back to any of our places, they'll be expecting that." Said Renny.

"May I make a suggestion?" Answered Aerore. "The library!"

"No." Replied Renny and Avariella at the same time.

"It's gotta be somewhere abandoned and out of the way. Preferably outside the city."

"Hey! I know a good place!" Beamed Avariella.

--------------------------------------------------

"The old baseball bat factory...Why am I not surprised..." Sulked Renny.

"Aw come on." Averiella swung a bat. "My dad used to work here. It's out of the city and no one comes here anymore. Besides you're a tomboy right? I thought you liked sports."

Varie's swing nearly hit Renny, she ducked to narrowly miss it. "Am I a tomboy? Yes. Do I hate sports? Yes again. Why do I have to like sports? Don't we hear enough about sports from you? You're the only one out of our group who likes them."

"You know, if you did sports you won't be overweight like that."

Renny was tempted to flattened her. "Hello? I have a disease that you're going to have soon!"

Varie didn't seem to hear her though and continued talking. Aerore thankfully came into the room with news on Varieo.

"How is he?"

"He's completely knocked out though. There's a massive bruise on his head, probably from where he hit you. The strangest thing is though, he seems to have a huge nosebleed that doesn't appear to be stopping. Keeps muttering something like 'I'm in heaven' or other." Renny blushed slightly.

"He will be alright though, right?"

"Oh, yes. According to my calculations, he should be up in less than an hour. In fact-"

There was groaning heard in the other room. The girls had turned to the doorway.

"He could wake up now!" Finished Aerore, she started running to see him but was grabbed by the collar by Renny.

"Wait, cool it wolf-girl. What do you think you're doing going in there like that? You trying to give him a heart attack? Let Avariella see him and prep him so he doesn't completely lose his mind when we go in."

"Oh! Good point Renny! Varie?"

The athlete smirked and put the bat over her shoulders. She walked in and the two giant animal girls huddled around the doorway to eavesdrop. The dark skinned boy was sitting up in the make-shift bed of a couch snapped in two.

"Heya Varieo! How ya feeling?"

He gave her a confused look.

"Who's Varieo?"

"Um, you are."

"I am?"

"Aerore!" Called Avariella. "Does the disease make people stupider or something?"

She sighed. "No Varie. This is quite the predicament. I think Varieo has amnesia."

"Great. I guess there's no harm in letting him see us then?"

They entered the room one at a time. But Varieo didn't even bat an eye.

"Are these guys like mascots or something? Where's the baseball game?"

Renny turned to Aerore. "What should we do?"

"Well, based on the books I've read from my father...We just need to wait until his memories return. And depending on the damage it could be hours...or months." At least he hit someplace soft, Renny thought to herself.

"So what do we do tubby and blubby?" Asked Avariella.

"Well..."
14512111111211211.title: Well, this sucks.

choices: Varieo is somehow immune to the disease.
145121111112112112.content:
Thinking for a moment, Renny suddenly had an idea. "Aerore. Both of your parents are doctors, right?"

"Correct."

"And both of them wouldn't give us away, right?"

"...I suppose so...What are you suggesting, Renny?"

"Varie, go grab Varieo. We're going back to town for a little bit."

-------------------------------------------------------

Renny had Varieo in her pouch again as the group walked along under the cover of darkness. Aerore had called her parents a head of time and told them to expect a visit and to not be 'surprised'. Needless to say, Aerore was not exactly thrilled to be seeing her parents as an overweight wolf.

"Must we really go see them? I mean- they're probably very busy..."

"Oh don't be such a wuss," Said Averiella as she walked along with you. "They said they'd do it. Plus we're all going to have to confront our parents about this sooner or later, thanks to some people..."

Renny raised her eyebrow. "Are you referring to me?"

"Naaaw. I mean how many other giant kangaroo girls do we know that would rather stick you in their pouch and hop than run like a normal person."

"Well maybe, if a certain athlete didn't lose a race with a freaking overweight wolf and kangaroo....She wouldn't be in the position she's in."

"What did you say?!"

"Um, 'ladies'...?" Said Varieo.

"WHAT?!"

"I think we're here..."

He was correct. Aerore's home, which was very futuristic complete with solar panels and self watering yard, stood in front of them. The lights were on in the living room. Aerore gave a huge sigh, reluctant to enter.

"Do we have to...?"

"Yes, now come on kiddo. Let's get this over with."

---------------------------------------------

Her parents took it surprisingly well. Only her mother fainted, and she only did so once. Her father seemed more interested in asking her questions, being the scientist that he was. They all looked alike, white hair and glasses. Her father looked almost like Albert Einstein actually. He had Aerore sitting down on the couch and was examining her with a stethoscope, of course he was wearing gloves to avoid infection.

"So, all four of you got infected you say?"

"Yes, Mr. Tiombe. Do you know anything about the disease at all?" Said Renny.

"Mmm, only very little. It's not something openly discussed at work. Technically it's supposed to be top secret. In fact, I'm surprised you all haven't been found by the government yet. Now, let me take a look at Varieo."

Aerore got up and let the dark skinned boy take her place. He still seemed confused at where he was, but didn't seem too worried. Averiella was being to look pale, and started to sweat profusely. Renny gave her a worried look.

"You feeling okay, Varie?"

"Y-yea...just sick..."

"I felt the same way when I was about to transform." Said Aerore. "Go to my room and use the bed. You just need some rest."

She nodded and turned for the upstairs. She looked slightly chubbier, the process was beginning. Renny grinned at Aerore.

"I wonder what animal she'll be..."

"Probably a pig, considering the way she eats." Giggled the wolf girl.

Aerore's father felt Varieo's forehead. There was a sudden look of surprise on his face and he turned to girls.

"Is something wrong, dad?"
145121111112112112.title: Hi mom and dad, promise not to get mad...

choices: Varie screams and everyone checks on her.
Bloono comes over to discuss a summer project
1451211111121121121.content:
"No, but it's quite extraordinary," Dr. Tiombre explained. "It seems as if Varieo's immune system is rejecting Morphosis!"

All the females in the room looked at him.

"Is that true Father?" Aerore asked, waddling over to the older boy. "Couldn't it be a delayed reaction?"

"I'm certain he's immune, since it's been a while since he first came in contact with Morphosis he should have at least began changing, however he hasn't. If my calculations are correct, then the Morphosis in his system has been broken down and neutralized."

Aerore reached a chubby, pawlike hand out towards the dark skinned young man and touched him, nothing happened.

"Hey, uh...Aerore's Dad." Varieo began.

"Yes son?"

"Why do you think I'm unaffected?"

The man of science shrugged. "It could be anything form hormones to genetics, either way your exceedingly fortunate. Maybe we could form an antidote if we study your blood."

"E-er...uh..." Varieo said as he backed up nervously. Something told him that he and needles didn't get along well.

Renny noticed and came to his aide.

"Dr. Tiombre, Varieo's just gotten amnesia, I don't think he can really consent for that kind of thing." the fat kangaroo girl said, coming to her amnesiac friends side.

"She is right dear." Aerore's mother said.

The doctor nodded. "Please forgive me, I got too enraptured in my discoveries...again."

"Um, no worries sir." Varieo said awkwardly before turning to Renny. "Thanks Re...Re...What was your name again."

The tomboyish Kangroo chuckled. "Renny, and its cool. What're friends for?" she asked rhetorically.

Just then...
1451211111121121121.title: Anti-anthro antibodies

14512111111211211211.content:
"WHAT THE HELL IS THIS?!!" Screamed a voice that echoed through the house.

"Ah, it sounds like Miss. Avariella has woken up." Said Dr. Tiombre.

Aerore softly giggled herself and nudged Renny on the shoulder. "I bet you fifty dollars that she's a pig."

"Hah, you're on."

-------------------------------------

Aerore, her mother, her father, Varieo, and Renny all crowded their way upstairs into Aerore's room to see what was the matter with Avariella. She had transformed. Reactions were mixed.

"Oh, my."

"What a fascinating example of the effects of the disease!"

"There are really some amazing things out there..."

"You owe me fifty dollars, Renny!"

"There goes my new skateboard..."

Avariella's hands and feet were now small cup shaped hooves. Her skin had reddened into a slight pink shade. Two floppy ears and a pig snout had formed on her face. There was even a curly tail poking out of her pants in the back. Oddly enough, while Renny and Aerore had grown both up and out, Varie's pig form seemed to only be a little taller but a lot wider. Aside from that, she looked pretty much the same with her old hair style.

"Why the hell did it have to be a pig??!!"

Aerore tried to consul her friend. "Come on now Varie. It's not that bad. I think you make an excellent pig-" She pegged her in the head with one of the pillows on the bed.

"Shut it Aerore! There's no way I'm going out in public like this!"
14512111111211211211.title: How fitting.

choices: Threw a strange device at Varieo
tried to attack, only to be knocked away by Avariella
145121111112112112111.content:
As Avariella was in the middle of her fit, there was a loud crash downstairs. Everyone stopped, but Aerore and her mother looked at Dr. Tiombe.

"Dad, did you leave our nuclear powered generator on too long?" Aerore asked.

The doctor shook his head no. "It's cooling down right now, why?"

The three anthros looked at one another.

"It must be shell boy!" Varie said, trying to forget about her new form.

"Who? Is he a friend of ours?" Varieo asked, but his answer came from a less than friendly reptilian man who literally jumped through the floor.

"Theirs, possibly. Yours, no." The turtle man said as he lifted the dark skinned boy up.

"Shell for brains!" Renny yelled. The kangaroo girl and her transformed companions glared at him fiercely, while the Doctor and his wife backed away.

"Good to see you again girls, however my name is Picasso, not shell for brains." The foe clarified.

"We don't particularly care! Just release Varieo!" Aerore growled.

"The turtle man chuckled when the human in question managed to kick him in the face, more by luck than skill.

Immediately he dropped the boy who stood up, panting.

Needless to say, Picasso wasn't happy. "Grr...You runt!!" he yelled as he...
145121111112112112111.title: Return of Picasso!

choices: Aerore is working on a formula for the cure.
1451211111121121121112.content:
Picasso raised his massive clawed hands, he was going to attack Varieo! Renny was too far a way from him to prevent the attack. The turtle man swung down, both Renny and Aerore closed their eyes. Suddenly there was a loud metal clang followed by a shattering crash. Renny slowly opened her eyes to see Avariella standing in front of a shell shaped hole in the house. A dented metal bat that she brought from the factory was in her hands.

"Whoa, I think that one was a homerun!"

Renny blinked several times. "Varie, did you just knock a gigantic turtle clear out of the house with a baseball bat?"

Aerore was hysterical. "MY ROOM! Varie! You completely exposed the sanctity of my bedroom to the filth and contamination of the outside!"

"I know, isn't it cool?"

Renny walked over to the gaping hole and put her hand to her brow to see where Picasso had landed. Avariella had knocked him so far a way that she couldn't even see him. A lot like what happened to Team Rocket at the end of every Pokemon episode. "Wow, you really pounded him like a baseball! I can't even tell where he landed."

"Yeah and I didn't even get a good shot at him!" She looked around the room and spotted Aerore's ball-shaped trophy for student of the year. "Hey Aerore! Can I see what happens if I hit-"

The wolf-girl quickly grabbed her prized possession. "Absolutely not! Besides shouldn't we be concerning ourselves with that turtle-man!?"

"I wouldn't worry about him Aerore." Answered Renny. "I mean, how often can you get up from getting beamed like that from a baseball bat?"

"I know! I should really try out for baseball this summer..." Said Varie as she flexed.

--------------------------------

The television showed a middle aged woman with soft brown hair and fancy suit,. She had a small stack of papers on the desk in front of her.

"This is Eyewitness News Myaiu Channel Five. This just in. It appears a...giant turtle was launched through a main street building. Police say no one was injured and the creature is currently unconscious according to federal agents. Nonetheless, this may be related to the outbreak of the deadly virus known as Morphosis in a local public school. Police have the entire area closed off. We go live to Jonathan Buck down at the lines. Jonathan?"

The pictured swapped to a young man with glasses and gelled hair. He had a microphone in his hand and appeared to be standing in front of several police cars. Behind that was a brick red building with a hole between two windows. A police helicopter whizzed by overhead. Jonathan cleared his throat.

"Yes, thank you Susan. As you said, police have already closed this area off and are preventing any unauthorized onlookers from entering. Even the men inside have to wear protective armor and radiation suits. If this is in fact an example of the disease known as Morphosis, the city may face a severe problem. All residents in the building have been quarantined in a research center where scientists are determining if they have been infected or not. They're now bringing in an armored van to transport the body of this giant...thing to escort it to a secure fac- Wait. What?"

The screen fuzzed out slightly and the shot returned to Susan looking concerned. "Jonathan is everything alright on your end?"

Another change in scene showed that whoever was holding the camera was running with Jonathan struggling to keep up. Police officers were trying to push the crowd of people a way from the building. "Susan!? Apparently, the creature has awoken and took out all federal agents on the floor! They're telling us to flee the area and-"

There was a huge explosion from the building, a large shell flew into the air like a bullet and landed on a nearby rooftop. The circling helicopters through a spot light on the turtle man and he quickly dove off to try and lose them.

"I don't believe this! Did you get that!? Tell me you got that!" Yelled Jonathan.

Susan was becoming increasingly worried. "Jonathan? What's going on over there?"

CRACK! The television cracked in half. The TV remote has been thrown clear through it. On the other end of the room it was in sat a some what large, black haired woman. She had an angry look on her face.

"How dare you test me Picasso!? Now with those policemen you won't be able to get that kid! Stop fooling around with those brats before I get angry and break you!"

-------------------------------------

Meanwhile, back at Aerore's residence...
1451211111121121121112.title: They beat the shell out of him.

choices: The girls decided to play/mess with Varieo
Aerore goes for a walk and finds a puppy
14512111111211211211121.content:
Later that night Aerore was in her Father's lab, studying some DNA samples and statistics that her Dad had compiled.

Meanwhile, her friends merely waited around, trying not to break anything.

"Fascinating!" The scientific wolf girl mused. "This is remarkable!"

"What is?" Avariella asked while sitting on a strained counter. "The fact that we can still move around despite being so fat? Or that you haven't started howling at the moon already?"

Aerore just glared at her swinelike friend. "Is that kind of attitude helping you return to normal?"

"No."

"Then I suggest you be quiet."

"Well, what's so interesting anyway?" Renny asked, eating some apples that were in a nearby basket.

"Well I compared our DNA and Varieo's and I think I've come up with a cure."

"Really?" Varie asked excitedly.

"Yes, soon you will no longer be Ms. Piggy." Aerore commented. "But it'll be a day before it's ready, since my Father's computer has to check behind my work for errors."

"What is this, a test?" Varieo asked.

"Sorry, but that's how long it takes, until then let's rest."

The mutated girls and Varieo then left, but the next morning....
14512111111211211211121.title: Aerore's cure?

145121111112112112111212.content:
The next day Renny awoke bright and early, feeling well rested and hungry.

"Man what a night! Now to wash up and get something to eat."

Renny got up from the couch she had been sleeping in and went to the Kitchen. Almost everyone was eating within.

Just then Renny waved, picking up a few muffins. "Hi everyone, where's Aerore?"

Varieo spoke up. "She went on a walk outside."

"She did?" Renny asked, it wasn't often that Aerore went outside.

"Yup, she asked me if I could go with her, but I was still a bit tired."

"She did huh?" Renny was starting to get curious. "Well, I'll go find her. See you guys later!"

The Kangaroo girl hopped outside, Aerore's house was out of the way, few people lived nearby, but there was a road that led to a pond that one could follow easily.

'I bet anything she went that way.'

~
