Meanwhile Aerore was walking sadly by herself down the road, confused.

They boy she liked was now staying with her, with no memories of how, admittedly, geeky she was at school.

Aerore had always had a slight crush on Varieo. He was a bit cute, and nice to her. He was even in her age group, more or less, but now he had no memories, and only knew her as the victim of a strange virus.

Even if she could win him over, she was a mutant now, which would make dating hard, not to mention awkward.

Just then, Aerore noticed a bulldog pup walk by. It stoppedand looked at her.

Aerore only smiled, unable to resist the dog's cuteness.

"Hi there boy. How are you this morning?" she asked, when the pup responded.

"Good miss! Thanks for asking."

Aerore only froze, but momentarily. "Did you reply to my query?" she asked the dog.

"Um, I think."

Aerore was completely flabbergasted, before she could tell the bulldog how astounding this all was, Renny showed up.

"Renny, you won't believe this! This adorable canine is able to speak coherent english!" Aerore said, looking at the pup. "Please show her puppy."
145121111112112112111212.title: The Dog listener?

14512111111212.content:
Avariella started to pant heavily, while suddenly breaking out into a cold sweat.

"You, guys figure this out I, I think I need to sit down."

Avariella staggers over to the couch and flops down bonelessly looking very pale and sweaty, while the two animal girls share a look as it didn't take them long to figure what was going on with their friend.

"Um, Aerore, I don't remember you or me getting this bad that fast." Comments Renny as Avariella starts to writhe around giving off moans of discomfort, while a few patches of dark fur start to sprout here and there.

"Renny, see if you can get an ice pack, you know this is going to get worse before it gets better." Aerore states taking command of the situation.

The roo girl nods quietly taking the book smart wolfs direction, before hopping heavily into the kitchen.

The two fully transformed girls then work on gibing their friend the vigil she needed, refilling the ice pack, and saying soothing things, as Avariella starts to balloon with fat, followed by her nose stretching into a muzzle, and her ears moving from the side of her head to the top of her scalp.

A few hours later Avariella's fever comes down and full consciousness starts to return.

"Oh, my head." Avariella moans before moving her hand to massage her temples, before seeing her hands were now covered with fur and were now something of a blend between a human hand and a paw of some kind.

"Girls, what happened!?" Avariella shouts, getting dangerously close to a panic attack.

The two other animal girls share a distressed look before turning to her.

"Avariella, I think it's best if you see for yourself." Says Renny the portly kangaroo producing a hand mirror, and carefully handing it to Avariella, the newly transformed girl takes it and slowly looks into the reflective surface, and staring back at her was a fat
14512111111212.title: Avariella started to sprout fur.

choices: She starts to feel heavier, and she notices she has a curly tail
15.content:
Varie was sprinting as fast as she could to school. She was about to be late and her Coach would kill her if she missed another class.

The girl was wearing jogging pants, a tank top and sweatband. Her hair was tied in a ponytail

'Alright! I can do this, give 120%!' The girl thought as she dashed to Myaiu High with incredible speed.

In only three minutes she had made it from her home to School, and was mere feet from her classroom.

"Yes! Home Ec's not far off and I have a minute to spare!" She said as she went through the hall. Today they were making her favorite, Raspberry Sundaes!

The athlete's mouth watered as she continued to run, driven by determination and hunger.

Just as the bell rang Varie made it into the classroom and did a victory pose!"

"Yes! Yes! Yes! I did it!!" She exclaimed as she jumped around happily before she sat down.

Her classmates were all used to these outburst, but so long as they said nothing, they'd be fine.

Bloono, the large young man who sat besides her, was the only one who broke this rule.

"Hey..." he said as he munched a celery stick, waiting for his friend to talk.

"Hiya Bloono? How are you? I'm great,but I'm starving and can't wait for summer though!" she babbled as she reached into her candy stash and picked out a chocolate bar.

She then looked around the class and noticed the teacher was gone.

"Where's Ms. Schmidt? Is she sick? Will we have a sub?" Varie asked

"Not sure." Bloono replied.

Just then a tall, somewhat overweight, dark haired woman walked in.

"Hello Class. You may call me Cashlin, I'll be substituting for your teacher today." The gothic woman said.

Varie got a weird vibe from her new sub, but ignored it.

"As a sort of welcoming present I have some cookies I've made for all of you." she said pulling out a basket. "I'll be teaching you how to make these later, so for now eat up." She said.

All the students got up and took one, as if compelled to do so.

Varie found it delicious and couldn't wait to learn the recipe.

What happened next?
15.title: Avariella "Varie" Suldia

choices: Varie is unable to unlock the door, or even turn it in her present state.
Varie manages to get through the door and tries to find a friend to help.
Varie, too humiliated to stay around school premises, quickly trots home.
152.content:
Varie was an athlete and had never had to worry about portion control. She smiled as the pudgy Ms. Cashlin, the new teacher, who, while obviously smart, seemed a bit TOO anxious to please the class, turned her head, her white cheek creasing into a double chin. Quickly she reached over the table for a second cookie, and snatched it. Quickly she wolfed it down. It wasn't, to her, "sneaking" a cookie at all--there really was nothing dishonest about it--it was just "cute." Others in the class laughed at her as she chewed and swallowed the cookie very quickly. Ms. Cashlin heard the class's laughter, and looked at the girl, briefly. There seemed to be a gleam of displeasure in her eye, but she could hardly call Varie on it. Varie was young and beautiful--that perfect combination of cute, hot and athletic, and Cashlin, being older (no matter how she disguised it with dark make-up), was a bit of a blob. It wouldn't do for an overweight teacher to scold a star athlete for taking another cookie. How many cookies had Cashlin herself already eaten before coming to class? She had to know everyone in the class would be wondering that if she were to so much as shoot Varie a reproving glance. Varie relished the lingering taste of the chocolate as the thing slid down her throat. Cashlin looked like she was about to say something, but wisely held her tongue, and got on with the lesson. And that, Varie thought, was the last she would hear on that.

But as the bell rang, Varie felt her teacher's pudgy hand resting on her shoulder. "Varie, I need to see you after class."

Varie played the part of the dumb, ponytailed blonde. "What is it, Cash--uh, Miss Cashlin?"

Cashlin walked behind her and shut the door. Then--to Varie's surprise--locked it. She began to feel a little anxious.

"Did you like my cookies today, Varie?" began Cashlin. Varie decided to beat her to the punch. How neurotic, to be angry about an extra cookie, she thought. This teacher was a real control freak.

"I liked them a LOT," answered Varie. "In fact, I liked them so much, I had two."

Cashlin laughed, and brushed her black hair from her face. "Well, you get points for being honest," she said. "But you know better than to steal. I really have a thing about stealing, whether cookies or recipes or whatever."

Oh please, thought Varie. She's just mad because there's one less extra cookie there to stretch that black skirt of hers.

"Are we done now?" asked Varie. "I need to get to practice!"

"We'll be done when you've learned not to take things that don't belong to you!" snapped Cashlin.

Varie wasn't afraid now. She was angry. It made her afraid when she knew she was in the wrong--but this teacher was crazy and miserable, and she was taking it out on her! "You fat old miserable pig!" she yelled back. "You talk about 'greedy,' but you only wanted to be able to gorge yourself on one more cookie. Unlock this door and let me out!"

Instead of erupting with rage (as Varie expected), Cashlin laughed. "So I'm a pig, am I? And miserable?"

Varie nodded uncertainly.

"Well, you know, Varie, there might be something to that." She reached in her pocket and pulled out a strange device. "But misery loves company."

With lightning speed, Cashlin put Varie (athletic though she was) in an armlock. Pulling up Varie's Varsity shirt, she held the device against her toned abs. "Hold still."

"What in the"--began Varie--then--"Ooowww!" The device contained a hidden needle that injected Varie with..something...right on her stomach, which she instinctively placed a hand over. She could feel the toned abs against her hand, but she couldn't feel her hand. Her stomach was numb, and the numbness began to radiate out toward her chest, head, arms and legs.

"What the hell was that?" She managed to stutter, as she fell to the floor.

"The numbness will pass," said Cashlin. "And I've just made a first recruit. Here, have another cookie. It'll help."

"Forget it," said Varie. "HELP!" she shouted, realizing she couldn't get out. Heeeeelllll--mmmfff!"

Varie's cry was interrupted by 200 calories of chocolatey goodness. She began to spit it out, back at Cashlin, but then she realized how good it tasted. Even better than before.

"Do you like that, you little piggy?" asked Cashlin. "Do you like how good that cookie feels in your gullet?"

Varie knew she was being called a pig by a fat woman, but somehow she didn't care. The cookie really was amazing. Then, she realized, she felt an odd pressure about her midsection.

She looked down, and to her horror, she saw her sweatpants beginning to ride over a surplus of pink flesh. "I"--she began--then to her FURTHER horror, overcome with emotion--she snorted.

"What--oink--is--oink-oink--hap-hap-grunt--happening to me?"

As she snorted, she began to fall on her hands and knees. She felt her belly--yes, it was a belly by now--hang down, together with her ripening boobs, and--what was this--two other strange globes of fat beginning to form like fruit underneath her. Handling them, she realized they were an extra set of breasts. She felt her face with her hands, and realized she was developing a double chin--but what was worse, her nose had widened to twice its size. Her ears were getting floppy and pointed as well.

The once proud athlete stood as best she could on--well, she could only call them haunches now--and tried to waddle out of the room, sending Cashlin into a laughing fit. "What-oink-are you-oink-DOING-oink-oink-grunt--to me?" Varie screamed as best she could and ran falteringly--sometimes on haunches, sometimes on her hands (which now only possessed three fingers each) to the door.
152.title: Poking a Pig

choices: In a cage at Cashlin's home
1521.content:
Varie began to trot/jog towards the door as best she could, but when she reached the door, her mutated hand wouldn't allow for her to unlock the door, let alone open it.

Cashlin laughed, watching her arrogant victim struggle gave her a true sense of self satisfaction.

After a few more agonizing minutes, Varie's fear began to subside, and she was finally clear minded enough to glare arrogantly at her evil teacher.

"*Oink-oink* Let me go right now you fat bitch, *Snort*!!!"

Cashlin laughed, she had already brought the know-it-all jock to her knees, so now it was time to play with her a bit. "Alright, I'll let you out of here, but why not have a few more cookies?"

Avariella was indignant. 'This overweight freak thinks she can tell me what to do?' she thought, snorting angrily, 'and for cookies?!'

But as Varie snorted, she inhaled the sweet chocolatey scent, her olfactory senses heightening it's aroma to irresistable levels.

Instantly primal instincts took over, despite Varie's mind protesting, her body trotted towards Cashlin, ate the cookie, and grunted happily.

After she downed the last of the confection, Varie was instantly mortified.

"What *snort* did you do to me *squeal-oink*?" Varie asked, the fear in her voice was as plain as her new nose was on her face.

"I injected you with a strain of modified Morphosis," she said, pulling out another cookie and sprinkling it with a dark blue powder "it seems to be working well so far."

Then, Cashlin casually dropped the cookie on the ground and gazed triumphantly at her mutated victim.

Despite all of Varie's pride, she picked the cookie up, sitting on her haunches but began to resist.

Tears began to fall from her eyes, she refused to fall any lower.

"I...*snort* won't eat this! *oink*" she said.

"Oh, you will." Cashlin said calmly, "Now be a good teacher's pet and eat up!" she said, smiling wickedly.

A minute passed & Varie ate it, she then slept, awaking later...
1521.title: Teacher's Pet...?

choices: Actually, it was somebody else instead.
15211.content:
Looking around in her new environment, Varie slowly opened her eyes to see that she was no longer within the school's campus, but instead was residing inside the home of someone very rich. However, what solidified the fact that what she had experienced wasn't a dream was when she noticed the iron bars of a cage, along with looking at what has become of her hands, which were now these three thick hoof-like fingers.

Seeing this alone broke the poor girl, as Varie started unleashing continuous tears from her closed eyes, covering herself with both hands, crying from the realization that she has become a fat miserable Pig-Girl, possibly with no way to turn back to normal. But suddenly, Varie then heard someone or something approaching the cage she was locked up in, revealing to be.....
15211.title: In a cage at Cashlin's home

choices: ...woke up squealing like the pig she suddenly was again.
...woke up the next morning with little incident.
15212.content:
Varie awoke with a start, instantly feeling her face and body with her five-fingered hands.

"Omigod. Thank God," she grunted, feeling no pig nose or ears, and no additional flab or extra breasts. It was one of those dreams that, no matter how ridiculous, FELT so real that waking up and realizing none of it was real was actually pleasurable.

"How completely bizarre," Varie thought, as she washed her face, staring at the toned young goddess in the mirror with a new gratitude. She didn't notice her flaws (one eye SLIGHTLY larger, a birthmark on her cheek, occasional acne) this morning like she usually did. It was a great way to start her 12th grade year. Her blonde hair streamed from her temples, wavy and bleached a slightly brighter color than was natural; her lips were full, her nose, delicate, her eyes adequately-lidded without being droopy. And her body, while still lean and muscular, had become slightly more womanly over the summer. She may not have been perfect, but thank God--thank God she was not a pig-woman. She laughed as she thought of it, and pushing her nose up, said "oink-oink" to the mirror. The rest of the dream quickly faded from consciousness.

Boys, old friends, old coaches, new books, new binders, new lockers, the smell of disinfected halls...it all had a way of playing with most students' nerves. But for Varie, as well as for the other seniors, nothing seemed too intimidating. It figured, she thought...just as you started to get used to a place..really make it your own, you realize it's the last go-round. She was excited--she, the consummate jock-and-cheerleader rolled into one, was excited--about some of her classes. Earth Science seemed easy (and surprisingly interesting), and the new English teacher, Mr. Bailer, was young and hip and dreamy (to use slang current fifty years ago), Not only that, but now--NOW--she was about to head to the most exciting class of all: Study Hall.

She had had one study hall before, and she remembered how much fun it had been. This year, she had TWO. Not only that, but she and Penelope, her best friend, had coordinated their schedules so that they had this study hall together. After hugging, and before "class" began, the two girls started to catch up.

"...and I worked on my uncle's farm for a while, too!"

"Get out. I didn't even realize ordinary people OWNED farms anymore. I thought it was all businesses these days...y'know...cooping chickens up on top of each other and stuff. I read about it in this book called "Why King Corn and Big Business is Evil."

"No, he is definitely a real farmer--I've got the tan lines to prove it he specializes in certain crops like soy and barley. No cows or pigs or anything like--Varie?"

"Omigosh, Pen--I had the WEIRDEST dream last night."

"Yeah?" said her friend, a bit annoyed at being derailed like this.

"Well, it was the first day of school, and I was wearing RUNNING clothes, and there was this really creepy teacher, who was all...oh...shit..."

"What's wrong, Varie?" asked Penelope, noticing her friend's face had gone white. She was staring toward the front of the room where the teacher was beginning to introduce herself.

"Omigod!" whispered Varie. "That's HER...the creepy woman from my dream! That's Miss..."

"...my name is Miss Biltennen," continued the young woman up front, addressing the class. She smiled pleasantly. Everything about her, in fact, SEEMED pleasant, other than the fact that her makeup was a tad too dark for her pale skin. She eyed the two whispering girls in the back corner for a moment, then rolled her eyes as if to say, 'Teen-age girls--is there any situation they can't manufacture drama from?' "I am, as I'm sure you've figured out, a teacher, and I NEED this period to plan classes. I'm not planning on treating any of you like babies, so by all means, communicate, as long as you don't distract me or other students from their work. I think we'll get along quite well." There was general eye-rolling from most of the girls, who tended to take an instant dislike to most young, pretty teachers (pleasingly plump or not) who seemed to be hard-asses. The guys, of course, generally approved.

Varie did not approve. Even after she'd settled down, and began to text Penelope next to her, she felt really weird about Miss Biltennen. True, her name was different, and she was a study hall teacher rather than a Home Ec teacher, but...weird. Was she merely, she wondered, projecting Biltennen's face backwards onto Cashlin's? What in the world was wrong with her?

The rest of the day passed, more or less, without incident (though not, perhaps, from the perspective of a popular teenage girl--gossip, boys, sports, mini-reunions of all kinds). Varie forgot her dream and Miss Cashlin/Biltennen. She lay down on her bed, exhausted, head brimming with new plans and burgeoning pre-college obsessions. This was going to be a great year. She drifted slowly, slowly...and...
15212.title: At her home, normal again?

152121.content:
Varie squealed. She hadn't meant to, but it was (suddenly) instinctive. Her dream of a normal life, of being beautiful or athletic or anything else melted away as the cold, muddy water she had been splashed with ran over her snout and down the creases of her new jowls.

"Pigg-ee!" squawked a voice. "Food time!" A second splash of water drenched her sizeable hindparts and made her shudder in the cool autumn morning air. She squealed again in shock and mortification as she realized she was naked, and tried to stand.

The task proved too difficult, and she fell, face-first in the mud. The girl was mostly pig by now. With great difficulty, she managed to feel her undersides with her two-fingered hand. There were six breasts there, but it was hard to distinguish them from the rest of the flab that hung from her belly now. She couldn't feel her face, but she was sure it was similarly transformed--the muddy water cascaded from her snout over several chins. At least she could still see her wavy, blonde hair, though it looked brown.

"Welcome back to Myaiu," the voice said. "I hope you had a nice sleep." It was a man's voice--she had at first expected Cashlin. She looked up, with difficulty, and saw her Bloono there, holding the empty bucket of water. He was nearly as dirty as she was, as they were in a pig pen of some kind.

Bloono! What are you doing here? Did Cashlin get you too? she thought, but only managed, "Snort, snort, grunt, Bloo snort!"

Bloono approached her and patted her hair. "This must be a shock to you. Here, you'll recover a bit once you've had some food, and then I'll explain."

Varie felt hope for the first time since she had awoken. If Bloono was here--if there were things to be explained--then perhaps the transformation could be reversed. She grunted in assent--she was rather hungry--and trotted on hands and feet in the direction Bloono had indicated(her legs were only slightly longer now than her arms, which caused her enormous backside and curly tail to stick up higher than her head). What she saw before her was not the sumptuous breakfast she had imagined, but a trough of slop, filled with garbage and complete with horseflies buzzing around it. She turned to Bloono, and tried to say, "You honestly expect me to eat THAT?" but what came out was "Weeee-ohhh-eeeegrooo."

"I know it's not exactly human food," said Bloono, "but let's face it, you're not exactly human anymore. Just try it."

Varie refused to go nearer to the stuff, managing to turn her head to the side in disdain...but not before her wonderful new nose picked up the scent. Her stomach rumbled and she began to drool uncontrollably. Before she knew what she was doing, her face was buried in the slop, and she was gobbling it down as though it was the most delicious thing she'd ever eaten. After a time, she felt Bloono pat her on her elevated rump.
"That's a good piggy," he said. The tone of his voice had changed. "But you need to leave some for the other hogs." He snickered. "You know, when the two of us were going to school together, you never would have so much as LOOKED at a big guy like me--much less let me pat your head or your ass. But who's the porker now?" Bloono ran his fingers across two of Varie's breasts. They were still fatty and globular enough--human-looking enough--for this to be indecent. Varie at first squealed because it tickled, and then angrily tried to defend herself the only way she knew how--by biting his hand. Bloono withdrew it immediately.

"You little sow!" he yelled, kicking her in her ample side. "Don't think for a moment I--or any human would--even consider TOUCHING you now! Here's what's going to happen. Miss Cashlin has me keeping this farm for her. She owns a great deal of property out here, where she employs a lot of your classmates (many of whom don't at all mind seeing you get what's been coming to you for a long time). You'll be sorry for biting the hand that fed--"

"Is there a problem, Bloono?" asked a pleasant voice behind him. Though Varie's vision was dimmer than it had been, she could still see enough to confirm her ears and nose's report that this was, indeed, Miss Cashlin.

"Oh, this little pig classmate of mine tried to bite me AFTER I fed her!"

"Is that true, Varie?"

"Weeeeeee *snort*!"

"Bad piggy," she said, nicely, stroking Varie's blonde hair and scratching her pink back. "I can't blame you, though--I imagine you're pretty confused about what's going on. I'll fill you in soon enough, but for now...enjoy the "simple life." I'll be around if you need me. Cashlin patted the horrified pig-woman's buttocks and walked out of the pen. "Bloono, make sure this porker with all her...equipment...isn't a waste of space--use her either to get me some fat-backed bacon, or some new pigs."

"You got it," Bloono said. "Come with me, piggy." Bloono pinched Varie--hard--on the backside, and sent her squealing into an adjacent pen. Varie, horrified, watched as Bloono opened a small door from outside the pen, and three hairy hogs--humongous with sharp teeth and fearsome calls--began to approach and fight over her.

"Every boy in class wanted you, and you didn't even look in my direction, though I loved you more than all of them. Well now, like before, you have your pick of male chauvinist pigs." Varie trotted--sometimes on her hind legs, her six pendulous boobs swaying ridiculously, sometimes on all four "legs," to the corner of the mating stall and watched the competition. The largest boar, of course, intimidated the others and began to approach her. An all-too-human scream escaped from her still-full lips as he tried to mount her from behind. Then...
152121.title: Cold Water

choices: She awakes in her bed, as earth-Varie, and remembers the dream.
She awakes in her bed, as earth-Varie, and doesn't remember.
1521212.content:
She was lying down, fatty folds and boobs pressed against the dirt. She tried to cry. The hogs were finished--all three of them, as it turned out--and what's called...rape and gang-banging, and all kinds of things in the human world is, she reflected, called "normal" in the animal kingdom. She rolled in the dirt to try to clean herself off, and reflected, as she tried to feel the things she felt she needed to feel--that if she ever got out of this situation, she would campaign for female animal rights.

She felt a hand on her head, scratching her blonde hair, between pointed, moderately floppy ears. "Did my pig have a nice romp in the hay with her gentleman callers?" asked Cashlin. Varie didn't have the strength to try to bite or charge the woman. She simply tried to express her outrage in a loud grunt.

"Goodness!" said Cashlin, without a trace of malice in her voice. "Goodness! It sounds like you certainly did! It occurred to me that your otherwise happy, simple existence as...heh...MY pig...might be somewhat troubled by the fact you don't quite understand what's going on. So let me fill you in:

"We all exist in more than one reality," she said, adopting a teacher's voice. "This allows us to be many different things at the same time. For example, here on Myaiu, you are, apparently, a pig--or something very like one. But what happens when you go to sleep? You drift right on over to another reality--one that calls THIS world the "spirit-world," or "dream-world," or what-have-you. The people in that reality seem to think that Myaiu is not "real," just as most people in Myaiu, when they go to sleep, tend to disbelieve the reality of what people call "Earth." But let me assure you, both are very real places.

"So in this version of reality, you are a pig, but you'll notice, you're still partly woman as well. Now THIS is highly unusual, because the virus I injected into you was meant to turn you COMPLETELY into a pig--but to a great extent, you're retaining the part of your humanity that exists within your "Earth" self. There are a number of other similarities arising between the two worlds, which means that something is pulling our two worlds--the world of Myaiu and the world of "Earth," or whatever you want to call it--together. Your "self" in this world is holding onto morphological characteristics occurring in the other world. I'm sorry if that's confusing to your pig brain!" she laughed.

It was a bit confusing, but, she thought--that meant she could at least forget about the nightmare that was Myaiu, when she was awake, right?

"That's a relief to you, is it?" asked Cashlin. "I'm glad. But here's the bad news (I mean, bad for you): your keeping woman characteristics in THIS reality is a two-way street. In other words, you may even begin to revert to an ordinary girl (though not if my viral injections can help it) in Myaiu, but that also means that on "Earth," you will become more and more pig-like. By infecting people HERE with this virus, I conquer not only THIS world, but the next! Anyway, I'm sure you're bored by now. Why don't you go back to rolling in the mud, like a good piggy, and I'll go back to masterminding an interdimensional takeover."

She lay, grunting, feeling sure that even now her pig-womb was teeming with abominations. Emotions like horror and sadness have a limit, and anyway, are not adequate to some situations. She felt numb instead, and fell, exhausted, to sleep.
1521212.title: it was over.

15212121.content:
Varie awoke gasping the next morning, hugging herself from fright.

She quickly began to check herself all over, to be sure she was normal and back home.

"That was too real!" Varie exclaimed, still lying in bed.

She was certain that her dream was real, there was no denying it.

Varie was concerned, she felt the secret to getting back to normal in Myaiu was at her school, and Bloono knew what it was.

It then occured to her that Mrs. Biltennen, Cashlin's veritable twin, could be her captor, but she needed proof.

After a few long seconds she got up and began to make a plot...a plot that involved breaking Cashlin's #1 rule.

Hours later, during the first study hall Varie ran to Mrs. Biltennen, panting heavily and looking hysteric.

She was five minutes late for class, and had bumped into her fellow students to get to the teacher, who was typing away on a laptop.

"Mrs. Biltennen! Penelope's in the hallway choking!" the jock cried.

"What?!" the teacher asked."How?

"I don't know! But I've looked everywhere for the nurse, and my phone isn't getting reception! Please you have to do something!" she said, crying.

Mrs. Biltennen stared at Avariella, her expression unreadable, but ran out the door as quickly as her pudgy body would allow. Many students followed to see the spectacle.

Once the room was clear, Varie quickly got on the laptop and plugged in a USB. She dowloaded all the files onto it, as swiftly as her fingers would allow and unplugged it.

The blonde beauty sighed in relief, phase one was completed.

Varie then ran out of the room and into the front of the crowd.

She knelt beside a 'choking' Penelope, who Mrs. B was struggling to help, and coughed twice. About ten seconds later Penelope spat out some gum she 'swallowed while running' earlier.

Penelope recieved a lecture from the portly Biltennen and was told to rest before getting in study hall. Penelope nodded before she and Varie exchanged glances.
15212121.title: Begin mission!

152121211.content:
That night, Varie was at home on her family's own computer she plugged in the USB and uploaded the files.

"Time to get cracking." Varie said to herself before sipping some coffee. It was definitely going to be an all nighter with all this data, but with the alternative being of being a pig-woman, she didn't mind.

She began to search file after file, filled with grades, lesson plans, and other useless info. She promptly deleted them, one by one.

After several hours of fruitless search, Varie came across two special files.

One was filled with scientific terms, and elevated english words. A few she made sense of were: Transmute, serum, strain, infect, and Morphosis.

The next file was heavily encrypted, and unaccessable without a password.

Varie cursed, but saved those two files, she then searched the remaining ones, but they had useless info.

The next morning Varie went to school yet again, but skipped her classes. She decided to go to the smartest senior (and possibly smartest person) at school, Aerore Tiombe.

Aerore was a freckly, but cute girl with oversized glasses and white hair. She was only 14, but was able to learn on a college level, despite opting to stay at high school.

She found the genius at her usual haunt, the school science lab. She was accompanied by her dear friend Renny Kaida.

Renny was busty (to the jealousy of many), tomboyish, and a bit innocent. She had short brown hair, as well as impressive height.

She started school late and was retained a year, and Aerore decided to help her with her studies. The two became inseperable, leading to bad rumors about their relationship.

Renny was typing on a computer while Aerore dictated.

"...Thus, the wolves in the woods to the north, keep our ecosystem in balance. So eliminating them would be undesi-" she said, when she saw Varie. "Ah, hello...Avariella correct?"

"Y-yeah, but just call me Varie." the jock said, somewhat embarrassed.
152121211.title: It'd take a genius to figure this out!

1521212111.content:
"You seem to have caught me while dictating a letter to the mayor." Aerore said, pushing up her glasses. Her long white hair, woven into a single braid moved as she spoke. "You see, the city was planning on letting hunters kill the wolves in the nearby woods, but in reality this would be detrimental to the ecosystem, throwing of balance and possibly-"

Aerore's explanation was interrupted by a great yawn, on Varie's part. The girl then realized her action might've been misunderstood.

"Sorry, I didn't sleep last night." Varie explained, when Renny spoke up.

"I understand, Renny's science talk keeps me up at night when I think really think about it. That elevated vocab of hers, y'know?"

Varie nodded. "Yeah. Say Aerore, do you know about computers."

The scienific girl smiled. "Yes, but I also know alot about the animal kingdom, literature, sciences, mathematics, and a dab of music."

Varie was getting excited. "So could you decipher somethings for me?"

"Why ever would I need to do such a thing?"

"Well, let's just say my life is at stake, and many other lives." Varie said honestly enough. She wanted to with hold some information, until she had proof of Myaiu's existence.


Aerore and Renny looked to one another before the genius made her decision.

"Sure. I'll send the data back to you as swiftly as I can. "

Varie smiled. "Great. Here's the USB, oh and don't tell anyone I was here."

"Don't worry." Renny said, being lax. "Privacy is our middle names!"

Varie thanked the two girls and headed to the cafeteria to meet with Penelope, but felt as if she was being tailed once she entered another hallway.

She was tired and in no condition to fight, if it came to that.

Her heart racing, Varie turned around to see...
1521212111.title: A not-so friendly schoolyard stalker

15212121111.content:
Standing just behind her was Bloono, calmly staring at her without a flicker of surprise in his eyes. A wonderful contrast to Varie's eyes which were probably filled with panic and fear.

Varie put her hands up, thinking Bloono was going to attack her. "B-Bloono?!"

He didn't even budge though, he just stood there casually chewing on his usual piece of celery. He then gave Varie a real confused look and cocked his head to the side.

"You feelin' alright Varie?"

Opening her eyes, Varie slowly realized that Bloono wasn't going to attack her. In fact she had to look like a mental patient right now by the position she was standing in.

Blushing and laughing nervously, she slowly lowered her arms. "S-sorry Bloono...I...uh...I thought you were someone else."

He narrowed his eyes a little. "Uh huh..."

Varie tried to change the subject. "Uh...I was just heading to the cafeteria to meet with Penelope..."

"Ah, actually I was supposed to give you something. I didn't mean to sneak up on you like that."

"What is it?"

Bloono reached into his pocket and pulled out something in his one giant hand.

It was a...
15212121111.title: A Meeting in the Hall.

choices: Varie loses consciousness and finds herself back on Myaiu--slightly more human
152121211112.content:
Bloono held up the USB drive Varie had left on Aerore's computer.

"Aerore told me to give you this back, Varie," said the stocky youth, nonchalantly. If he was hiding anything from his friend, he was hiding it well. "She" said she downloaded the files...hey, are you okay?"

Varie wasn't okay. The shock of seeing Bloono--and seeing him with the files she'd taken from Cashlin's or Biltennen's or whoever's computer--had caused her to grow very pale, and then flushed.

"I don't...feel so good..." The girl was now extremely red, and would have been in a cold sweat, except--

--as she sat down, wringing her hands, she realized it--

She was not sweaty. Not clammy, despite feeling chilled. There was not, in fact, an ounce of moisture on her skin.

Bloono leaned over her. "Varie. Varie! Are you okay?"

The chill had passed, and the blonde suddenly felt heat building up under her reddening skin. "No...'s'fine, Bloono...I'm juss...really hot..."

"Well, you look fine," said Bloono, reasoning that if his friend had been over-hot, her hair or skin would have dampened by now. "Do you need to rest, though?"

The heat was suddenly unbearable. "Yes," panted Varie. Her breath seemed to almost singe the outside of her skin as she panted, and--without warning and as if on instinct--she spread herself on the cool tiled floor. It was amazing--as refreshing as a drink of water. Jono ran to get the school nurse, and as he did, an alarming thought occurred to Varie which caused her to panic all over again, holding the USB disk even more tightly:

Pigs don't sweat.
152121211112.title: Symptoms Begin

1521212111121.content:
When Varie reawakened, her sight was obstructed by stands of her blonde hair and her piggish snout. She bolted upwards in fear, thinking that her Earth body had become like her Myaiu form.

She looked around to see herself in a pit of mud, the familiar trough and fence posts of the other world around her, not to mention the foul stench of unwashed animals her heightened sense of smell picked up. She was definitely on Cashlin's farm.

She stood up as best she could, noticing her hair was fuller than before, as well as the fact that she was standing taller than normal. Her hooves now seemed to resemble her hands, but they were still barely usuable.

She looked around and noticed that the farm hands (some of which were various students at her school) were just going about their business, ignoring her. Around her were several "other" sows. The boars were mercifully in another pen, while she took a look at her surroundings her stomach began to rumble. She tried to sigh, but it came out as an embarassing grunt.

'Great, I'm in Porky Pig Hell and now I'm starving.' She thought, when she saw someone, a girl, filling the trough with slop.

"Feeding time piggies!" the girl said before leaving, her eyes staying on varie for only a couple seconds. Varie couldn't see her very well, but she ran off quickly.

Before Varie could even begin to feel disgust, she was jostled and bumped by several of the hogs around her, greedily gulping the muck and splattering her with mud.

All the altheltic mutant saw was the curly tailed creature stuffing themselves. Varie couldn’t bring herself to eat it.

Within ten minutes, the sensation was unbearable and Varie couldn’t help but walk towards the trough clumsily, but when she leaned down to see the food, it was gone.

Sadly, Varie tried to sleep, somewhat thankful that Cashlin, and Bloono (or was it this world’s Bloono?) had not appeared. Yet rest would not come to her, a couple hours later the workers had gone in for dinner, the scent of food wafting towards her poor nose, making her mouth water.

Just then she smelled something, a roll, some green beans, and a side of Mashed potatoes.

“I thought you might want this.” a voice said, it was…
1521212111121.title: A slightly more welcome change

choices: Gobble down the delicious human food?
15212121111211.content:
"How's my special little sow today?" asked Bloono. His tone would have been kind if she had not been one of his classmates.

Her first instinct was to bite his hand, again. But she was thinking a little more clearly now than last time, and anyway, that food smelled better than food had ever smelled to her when she was human. She grunted at him insistently, and at one point, her once-full lips managed, "Bloon--oink!"

"Whoa! A certain fat little piggy is sure excited about MY food!" he retorted, snatching the plate from under her nose, and stuffing the roll in his mouth. She attempted to look at him insolently, but she _was_, she realized, drooling. He looked thoughtful, for a moment.

Enough of her snout had now reverted to human face to create two chubby cheeks, and he grabbed one, looking directly in her small eyes. "Hmm...refusing the food that the other pigs are happy enough with, as though YOU think you're better than them...almost saying my name....why, if I didn't know better, I'd say Cashlin's drug was wearing off...I'd better run and get the boss-lady," he chuckled. Wouldn't want her prize sow developing thumbs and smarts again, then trotting off into the wild!" As he said it, Varie began to realize her forefeet WERE, in fact, beginning to separate into fingers again. It was now or never, she suddenly realized.

"But JUST to make sure ya don't go, lardy-pie"--and here, Bloono stroked one of Varie's blubbery (and increasingly human) flanks--"I'm gonna leave the rest of this plate for you to gobble up. Don't say I never did anything for you."

With another cruel laugh, Bloono threw the plate of potatoes and greens to the other side of the pen, closed the gate, and ran toward (Varie was beginning to make it out) the farmhouse. It was her one chance. But she felt so weak, and that food, even if she had to lick it off the ground, would be SO good. It was decision time.

Does Varie:
15212121111211.title: Bloono?

choices: She gets caught, put to sleep, and awakens on Earth
Same as above, but Cashlin has a special punishment first
152121211112112.content:
In the end Varie couldn't resist the enticing smell of food. Trotting absently to where the green beans were, she put her head down and ate them. The cooked vegetables did have a bit of mud on them, but she managed to ignore the nasty sediment. Then she moved on to the potatoes, they weren't as good as expected, but she ate them anyway.

By the time her fierce hunger was sated, Varie realized that many minutes had passed, and that Bloono could be back with Cashlin any second. Frantically she tried her best to flee. As she did, she wondered about what would happen if she received another injection of the strange serum that made her into this freak. In all honesty she knew that she probably wouldn't make it. Internally, she cursed her stupid hunger, she cursed this world's Bloono, and she cursed that fat bitch Cashlin.

She managed to exit the pen, still angry and scared.

What happens next?
152121211112112.title: Gobble down the delicious human food?

choices: She's 9 months pregnant with sextuplets in a dump and extremely obese as a human
She's still in the warehouse attached to the tube, but now very pregnant
1521212111121122.content:
"Gotcha!" Bloono said as he walked in the way of Varie's path with Cashlin right behind him.

"Hmmm... since you just tried to escape, we can't just put you back into your pen, for fear of you escaping again. This calls for a special punishment. Bring her into the feeding pens!" Cashlin laughed as Bloono dragged Varie into a bigger, more crowded pig pen that had strange machines along the walls, with aisles along the middle. It was a warehouse like pen that had all males in it, all with huge bodies and stomachs full of food. Varie also noticed that all of the pigs were hooked up to the machines, and were feeding from it.

Suddenly, she realized her fate.

"Yes, all of these pigs haven't seen a female in quite some time and are all dying to reproduce" Bloono said with a smile, "I imagine that you'll have quite a fun time with all of them as you yourself eat to your heart's content…and more." He laughed and hooked her up to one of the larger machines ad placed her mouth on a strange tube. The machine started up, and Varie felt the food begin to enter her mouth. Suddenly, her pig senses went into overdrive and she began to suck on the tube hungrily. The food seemed to only become better and better tasting as Varie continued to suck on the tube and squeal with involuntary glee. Out of corner of her eye, she noticed the other giant, hugely obese pigs begin to notice her expanding body with interest. The two pigs next to her suddenly stopped feeding and came up behind her. She felt foreign liquids flow through her from behind as she turned her head and saw all of the other pigs start to come up behind her.

Varie closed her eyes and sucks on the feeding tube, in a desperate attempt to escape everything happening to her, as all of the male pigs have their way with her still fattening body. Strangely enough, for each male that ejected a load of sperm into Varie's body, she squealed in happiness and pleasure, like she loved what she was doing and wanted even more. When they were done, Bloono came in and attached the pigs back to their feeding tubes, while glancing over at Varie's huge body, visibly attracted to it. She looked at him in slight disgust, but her pig brain told her to ignore him and focus on the yummy food. Bloono came over to her, rubbing her fat rolls and caressing her huge ass. Varie tried to stop him, but she couldn't stop eating...and eating...and eating...Soon that's all she cared about as Bloono also had his way with her fattening body, only in a more rough and deeper penetration than the pigs did, although it was waaay more pleasurable and satisfying according to her pig mind.

But according to Varie the human's mind, however small it was in control of her body, she was appalled and outraged at how she was being treated. Desperately, she forced herself to close her eyes and calm her breathing down, to fake her pig mind that she was asleep, while she thought of a plan of possible, hopeless escape.....
1521212111121122.title: Punished with Food!

info.brief_description: A sickness spreads across the land of Myaiu. Causing people to turn into fat animals!
info.description:
Welcome to the world of Myaiu. It is a large island not much different from the real world, modern technology rules the land while people go along with their daily lives. However, it is in this land that something horrible would go wrong. A plague is upon it's people.

It began with scientists, obsessed with creating a powerful drug to tap into the endless potential of the human body. The drug, called Morphosis, generated high amounts of calories in the human body creating excess fat. Those affected with the drug were able to call upon the calories for massive amounts of surplus energy, essentially creating super human strength. However, the head developer of the project was not satisfied with the results and decided to add animal DNA to the drug. The results proved to be too dangerous and the scientists were ordered to execute all test subjects. On the night when they were meant to do this, there was a giant explosion from the lab.

No one from the research team was ever heard from again, the laboratory they worked in was laid to waste. However, from the ruins of the research rose a powerful female by the name of Cashlin. She possessed the powers of the drug and worse, was able to infect others with the same powers like a sickness. Creating a small army, she challenged the government with war. A war unknown to Myaiu's people.

Today, five students from a local school go about their daily lives. Blissfully unaware of the approaching storm...

Characters:

Aerore Tiombe- Female (14). Shy and studious. Has white hair, glasses, and freckles. Loves animals.

Varieo Alick- Male (15). Kind and protective. Dark skinned and thin. Hates cats, but deeply cares for his friends.

Bloono- Male (17). Black haired and pale skinned. Is very large and aloof. Has a habit of munching on a celery stick.

Renny Kaida- Female (19). Big busted girl who has short brown hair. Tomboyish. Friend of Aerore. Extremely naive.

Avariella "Varie" Suldia- Female (17). Hyper, short athlete. Can't sit still for a moment, and is very talkative. Also naive. Loves candy but never gains weight.

Cashlin- Female(??). Tall, dark, and childish. Cashlin can't stand losing and will often boast whenever winning at anything. Mysterious otherwise, with no known background or history. Immensely powerful.

----------------------------------------------------------------------

Now that the serious story stuff is out of the way, enjoy! Keep the plot to that of an adventure. You will follow one of the five student's perspectives throughout the story. Anything goes so long as it makes sense with the Morphosis sickness (Read above for details or mail me with questions.)

This is an animal/anthro TF WG story for the most part.

Have fun.
